trans-unit.resname: CLB·1 | Faceless One | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faceless One
trans-unit.target: 无面者

trans-unit.resname: CLB·1 | Faceless One | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. CARDNAME is the chosen color.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 如果CARDNAME是你的指挥官，则在游戏开始前选择一种颜色。CARDNAME是该色。 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·2 | Abdel Adrian, Gorion's Ward | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Abdel Adrian, Gorion's Ward
trans-unit.target: 葛力安养子阿波戴尔亚德恩

trans-unit.resname: CLB·2 | Abdel Adrian, Gorion's Ward | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile any number of other nonland permanents you control until Abdel Adrian leaves the battlefield. Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each permanent exiled this way.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐任意数量由你操控的其他非地永久物，直到阿波戴尔亚德恩离开战场为止。每以此法放逐一个永久物，便派出一个1/1白色士兵衍生生物。 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·3 | Ancient Gold Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ancient Gold Dragon
trans-unit.target: 远古金龙

trans-unit.resname: CLB·3 | Ancient Gold Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. You create a number of 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature tokens with flying equal to the result.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，掷一颗d20。你派出若干1/1蓝色，具飞行异能的仙灵／龙衍生生物，其数量等同于掷骰结果。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·4 | Archivist of Oghma | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Archivist of Oghma
trans-unit.target: 欧格玛的档案师

trans-unit.resname: CLB·4 | Archivist of Oghma | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhenever an opponent searches their library, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 每当任一对手搜寻其牌库时，你获得1点生命且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·4 | Archivist of Oghma | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Knowledge is the greatest tool of the mortal mind, outweighing anything made by mortal hands. Before anything else can exist, the idea must exist."
trans-unit.target: 「知识是凡人心智的最伟大工具，强过凡人双手的一切造物。必先有其思，方能塑其形。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·5 | Ascend from Avernus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ascend from Avernus
trans-unit.target: 突破禽绝地狱

trans-unit.resname: CLB·5 | Ascend from Avernus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return all creature and planeswalker cards with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 将所有法术力值等于或小于X的生物和鹏洛客牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·5 | Ascend from Avernus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Smoke clogged the streets and rubble littered the ground, but sunlight shining on the long-lost towers of Elturel was still a beautiful sight.
trans-unit.target: 虽然街道依旧黑烟滚滚、瓦砾遍地，但能重见阳光洒在失落已久的埃尔托瑞尔高塔之上，此等美景仍令人欣慰。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·6 | Astral Confrontation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Astral Confrontation
trans-unit.target: 星界拉扯

trans-unit.resname: CLB·6 | Astral Confrontation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent you're attacking.\nExile target creature.
trans-unit.target: 你每正向一位对手进行攻击，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。 放逐目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·6 | Astral Confrontation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "After voyaging all the way through the Astral Sea with my life hanging by a silver thread, fighting the mind flayer was the easy part."
trans-unit.target: 「在将生命系于银线、闯过这众星之海以后，跟夺心魔搏斗倒还算是轻松的。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·7 | Bane's Invoker | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CLB·7 | Bane's Invoker | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 御风而行～{8}：直到回合结束，至多两个目标生物各得+2/+2且获得飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·7 | Bane's Invoker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Lord of Darkness elevates only those who serve."
trans-unit.target: 「黑暗之主只青睐诚心侍奉者。」

trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的非地永久物和所有由你对手操控且与该永久物同名的其他非地永久物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.target: 提尔的战斗天使

trans-unit.resname: CLB·9 | Battle Angels of Tyr | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, myriad\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, draw a card if that player has more cards in hand than each other player. Then you create a Treasure token if that player controls more lands than each other player. Then you gain 3 life if that player has more life than each other player.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，繁影 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，如果该牌手的手牌数量比每位其他牌手都多，则你抓一张牌。然后如果该牌手操控的地比每位其他牌手都多，则你派出一个珍宝衍生物。然后如果该牌手的总生命比每位其他牌手都多，则你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: If you would put one or more counters on a creature or planeswalker you control or on yourself, put that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 如果你将在你自己或某个由你操控的生物或鹏洛客上放置一个或数个指示物，则改为在该牌手或永久物上放置该数量加一的各种指示物。 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·30 | Lae'zel's Acrobatics | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lae'zel's Acrobatics
trans-unit.target: 莱埃泽尔的巧躯

trans-unit.resname: CLB·30 | Lae'zel's Acrobatics | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Exile all nontoken creatures you control, then roll a d20.\n1–9 | Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.\n10–20 | Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control, then exile them again. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 放逐所有由你操控且非衍生物的生物，然后掷一颗d20。 1～9 | 在下一个结束步骤开始时，将这些牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。 10～20 | 将这些牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场，然后再度将它们放逐。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将这些牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.target: 军团忠诚

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have myriad. (Whenever a creature with myriad attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有繁影异能。（每当一个具繁影异能的生物攻击时，对防御牌手之外的每位对手而言，你可以派出一个为前述生物复制品的衍生物，其为横置且正向该牌手或某个由他操控的鹏洛客进行攻击。在战斗结束时，放逐这些衍生物。）

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)\nWhenever enchanted creature attacks, each other creature that's attacking one of your opponents gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+1/+1且已煽惑。（它每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。） 每当所结附的生物攻击时，每个正向你的任一对手进行攻击之其他生物各得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Candlekeep Inspiration
trans-unit.target: 烛堡启示

trans-unit.resname: CLB·59 | Candlekeep Inspiration | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X, where X is the number of cards you own in exile and in your graveyard that are instant cards, are sorcery cards, and/or have an Adventure.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，由你操控之生物的基础力量与防御力为X/X，X为放逐区和你的坟墓场中由你拥有之瞬间牌、法术牌和／或具历险之牌的总数量。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·59 | Candlekeep Inspiration | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Tales of heroes past galvanize the heroes of the future.
trans-unit.target: 过去英雄的传说事迹，激励将来英雄不断成长。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·60 | Candlekeep Sage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Candlekeep Sage
trans-unit.target: 烛堡智者

trans-unit.resname: CLB·60 | Candlekeep Sage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "When this creature enters or leaves the battlefield, draw a card."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「当此生物进入或离开战场时，抓一张牌。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·60 | Candlekeep Sage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You love the smell of dusty tomes, the flicker of candles during late-night reading, and the old texts that bring to life the scholars who have come before.
trans-unit.target: 你热爱尘封书卷的陈年气味，钟情挑灯夜读的闪烁烛光，沉迷令过往先贤跃然纸上的古老文字。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·61 | Cone of Cold | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cone of Cold
trans-unit.target: 寒冰锥

trans-unit.resname: CLB·61 | Cone of Cold | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Roll a d20.
1–9 | Tap all creatures your opponents control.
10–19 | Tap all creatures your opponents control. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
20 | Tap all creatures your opponents control. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps. Until your next turn, creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 掷一颗d20。 1～9 | 横置所有由对手操控的生物。 10～19 | 横置所有由对手操控的生物。这些生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。 20 | 横置所有由对手操控的生物。这些生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。直到你的下一个回合，由对手操控的生物须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·62 | Contact Other Plane | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Contact Other Plane
trans-unit.target: 异界探知

trans-unit.resname: CLB·62 | Contact Other Plane | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Roll a d20.
1–9 | Draw two cards.
10–19 | Scry 2, then draw two cards.
20 | Scry 3, then draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 掷一颗d20。 1～9 | 抓两张牌。 10～19 | 占卜2，然后抓两张牌。 20 | 占卜3，然后抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·63 | Displacer Kitten | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Displacer Kitten
trans-unit.target: 移位幼兽

trans-unit.resname: CLB·63 | Displacer Kitten | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Avoidance — Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, exile up to one target nonland permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 回避～每当你施放非生物咒语时，放逐至多一个目标由你操控的非地永久物，然后将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·63 | Displacer Kitten | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Isn't she the cutest thing you've almost seen?"\n—Doen, purveyor of exotic pets
trans-unit.target: 「她是不是你这辈子见过最可爱的小东西？」 ～异宠贩商多恩

trans-unit.resname: CLB·64 | Draconic Lore | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Draconic Lore
trans-unit.target: 龙族传说

trans-unit.resname: CLB·64 | Draconic Lore | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Dragon.\nDraw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控龙，则此咒语减少{2}来施放。 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·64 | Draconic Lore | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The wyrmling studied the ancient carvings and dreamed of a day when her own exploits would be immortalized in stone.
trans-unit.target: 雏龙正在研读古代雕文，梦想有一天她自己的成就也能永久留在石中。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·65 | Dragonborn Looter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dragonborn Looter
trans-unit.target: 龙裔掠夺客

trans-unit.resname: CLB·65 | Dragonborn Looter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·65 | Dragonborn Looter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Erdur never thought of it as stealing. Treasure simply didn't deserve to be stuck underground where no one could admire it.
trans-unit.target: 伊朵从不觉得这是偷窃。宝藏原本就不应该深埋地下无人赏识。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·66 | Dream Fracture | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dream Fracture
trans-unit.target: 梦想破裂

trans-unit.resname: CLB·66 | Dream Fracture | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. Its controller draws a card.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。其操控者抓一张牌。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·66 | Dream Fracture | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In her dream, Lola gazed into a mirror. Her familiar features warped, her jaw stretching wider and wider until it cracked and her reflection pulled her into its gaping maw.
trans-unit.target: 在梦境里面，萝拉凝视镜中。她原本熟悉的相貌扭曲变形，下巴越拉越开直至裂开，最终整个映像将她拉入血盆巨口之中。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·67 | Dungeon Delver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dungeon Delver
trans-unit.target: 地城探索者

trans-unit.resname: CLB·67 | Dungeon Delver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "Room abilities of dungeons you own trigger an additional time."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「由你拥有之地城的房间异能均额外触发一次。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·67 | Dungeon Delver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You're driven not by a lust for gold or baubles, but by the thrill of danger and the excitement of the unknown.
trans-unit.target: 你的动力并非来自对金钱或饰品的欲望，而是源自克服危险的刺激与探索未知的兴奋。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·68 | Elminster's Simulacrum | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elminster's Simulacrum
trans-unit.target: 伊尔明斯特的拟像术

trans-unit.resname: CLB·68 | Elminster's Simulacrum | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each opponent, you create a token that's a copy of up to one target creature that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 为每位对手各进行以下流程～你派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为至多一个目标由该牌手操控之生物的复制品。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·68 | Elminster's Simulacrum | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why simply sit back and applaud the good ideas of others when I can improve upon them?"\n—Elminster
trans-unit.target: 「如果我能改进他人精妙想法，又何必只是闲坐一旁鼓掌称赞？」 ～伊尔明斯特

trans-unit.resname: CLB·69 | Feywild Caretaker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Feywild Caretaker
trans-unit.target: 妖精荒野照护人

trans-unit.resname: CLB·69 | Feywild Caretaker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you have the initiative, create a 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你掌握先制。 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你握有先制，则派出一个1/1蓝色，具飞行异能的仙灵／龙衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·69 | Feywild Caretaker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hello, my fluttering friends! Isn't it a beautiful day?"
trans-unit.target: 「你好呀，飞翔的小朋友们！今天的天气可真好！」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·70 | Feywild Visitor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Feywild Visitor
trans-unit.target: 妖精荒野访客

trans-unit.resname: CLB·70 | Feywild Visitor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you create a 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature token with flying."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「每当一个或数个由你操控且非衍生物的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你派出一个1/1蓝色，具飞行异能的仙灵／龙衍生生物。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·70 | Feywild Visitor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Fey energy clings to you, a shimmering reminder of your otherworldly travels.
trans-unit.target: 你身上附着妖精能量，这些都是你过往异界之旅的闪亮回忆。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·71 | Font of Magic | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Font of Magic
trans-unit.target: 魔力泉涌

trans-unit.resname: CLB·71 | Font of Magic | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game.
trans-unit.target: 你本盘游戏中每从统帅区施放过一次指挥官，你施放的瞬间与法术咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·71 | Font of Magic | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Warnis had always felt a glimmer of potential within herself, flickering just out of reach. That night, as the cultists attacked, it became a torrent of power that was hers to command.
trans-unit.target: 瓦妮丝总觉得自己体内有股潜藏力量，在自己所不能及之处蠢蠢欲动。就在邪教徒来袭那晚，这股力量终于在她的掌控下喷薄而出。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·72 | Gale, Waterdeep Prodigy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gale, Waterdeep Prodigy
trans-unit.target: 深水城逸才盖尔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·72 | Gale, Waterdeep Prodigy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, you may cast up to one target card of the other type from your graveyard. If a spell cast from your graveyard this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你从你手上施放瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以从你的坟墓场中施放至多一张目标牌，且须为另一类别。如果以此法从你坟墓场中施放的咒语将进入你坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·73 | Gale's Redirection | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gale's Redirection
trans-unit.target: 盖尔的倒转术

trans-unit.resname: CLB·73 | Gale's Redirection | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Exile target spell, then roll a d20 and add that spell's mana value.\n1–14 | You may cast the exiled card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.\n15+ | You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标咒语，然后掷一颗d20，并将点数加上该咒语的法术力值。 1～14 | 于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以施放之，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放该咒语的费用。 15+ | 于该牌持续被放逐期间，你可以施放之，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·74 | Goggles of Night | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goggles of Night
trans-unit.target: 夜视镜片

trans-unit.resname: CLB·74 | Goggles of Night | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, scry 1, then draw a card. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，占卜1，然后抓一张牌。（占卜1的流程是检视你牌库顶的牌，然后你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。） 佩带{2}（{2}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。只能于法术时机佩带。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·75 | Gray Harbor Merfolk | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gray Harbor Merfolk
trans-unit.target: 灰港人鱼

trans-unit.resname: CLB·75 | Gray Harbor Merfolk | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked.\nCARDNAME gets +2/+0 as long as you control a commander that's a creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被阻挡。 只要你操控为生物或鹏洛客的指挥官，CARDNAME便得+2/+0。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·75 | Gray Harbor Merfolk | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Harbormasters tend to forget that security shouldn't stop at the surface.
trans-unit.target: 港务长总忘记安保工作不应仅止于水面。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·76 | Illithid Harvester | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Illithid Harvester
trans-unit.target: 汲魄灵吸怪

trans-unit.resname: CLB·76 | Illithid Harvester | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Ceremorphosis — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, turn any number of target tapped nontoken creatures face down. They're 2/2 Horror creatures.
trans-unit.target: 蜕变～当CARDNAME进战场时，将任意数量目标已横置且非衍生物的生物翻为牌面朝下。它们是2/2惊惧兽生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·76 | Illithid Harvester | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your mind belongs to the Emperor now."
trans-unit.target: 「你的意识已归皇帝掌控。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·76 | Plant Tadpoles | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plant Tadpoles
trans-unit.target: 种植幼体

trans-unit.resname: CLB·76 | Plant Tadpoles | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap X target creatures. They don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)
trans-unit.target: 横置X个目标生物。它们于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。（然后放逐此牌。之后你还可以从放逐区施放该生物。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·77 | Imoen, Mystic Trickster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Imoen, Mystic Trickster
trans-unit.target: 神秘诡术师爱蒙

trans-unit.resname: CLB·77 | Imoen, Mystic Trickster | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you have the initiative, draw a card. Draw another card if you've completed a dungeon.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 守护{2}（每当此生物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{2}，否则反击之。） 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你握有先制，则抓一张牌。如果你完成过地城，则再抓一张牌。 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·78 | Irenicus's Vile Duplication | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Irenicus's Vile Duplication
trans-unit.target: 艾瑞尼卡斯的邪恶副体

trans-unit.resname: CLB·78 | Irenicus's Vile Duplication | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control, except the token has flying and isn't legendary if that creature is legendary.
trans-unit.target: 派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标由你操控之生物的复制品，但此衍生物具有飞行异能，且如果该生物是传奇，则此衍生物不是传奇。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·78 | Irenicus's Vile Duplication | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You will serve me better in this form."\n—Jon Irenicus
trans-unit.target: 「你在这种形态给我的服侍最受用。」 ～琼艾瑞尼卡斯

trans-unit.resname: CLB·79 | Juvenile Mist Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Juvenile Mist Dragon
trans-unit.target: 青年迷雾龙

trans-unit.resname: CLB·79 | Juvenile Mist Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nConfounding Clouds — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each opponent, tap up to one target creature that player controls. Each of those creatures doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 混乱迷云～当CARDNAME进战场时，为每位对手各进行以下流程～横置至多一个目标由该牌手操控的生物。这些生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·80 | Kenku Artificer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kenku Artificer
trans-unit.target: 天狗奇械师

trans-unit.resname: CLB·80 | Kenku Artificer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Homunculus Servant — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target noncreature artifact. That artifact becomes a 0/0 Homunculus artifact creature with flying.
trans-unit.target: 人工生命仆从～当CARDNAME进战场时，在至多一个目标非生物的神器上放置三个+1/+1指示物。该神器成为0/0，具飞行异能的造妖神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·80 | Kenku Artificer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though her words may be unoriginal, her creations are anything but.
trans-unit.target: 她说的话可能是老调重弹，但她的造物总是充满新意。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·81 | Kindred Discovery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kindred Discovery
trans-unit.target: 同族发现

trans-unit.resname: CLB·81 | Kindred Discovery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nWhenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种生物类别。 每当一个由你操控的该类别生物进战场或攻击时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·81 | Kindred Discovery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A family that welcomes birds of all feathers.
trans-unit.target: 鸟以群聚，万羽归家。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·82 | Lapis Orb of Dragonkind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lapis Orb of Dragonkind
trans-unit.target: 青金龙珠

trans-unit.resname: CLB·82 | Lapis Orb of Dragonkind | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {U}. When you spend this mana to cast a Dragon creature spell, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{U}。当你将此法术力用来施放龙生物咒语时，占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·83 | Modify Memory | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Modify Memory
trans-unit.target: 篡改记忆

trans-unit.resname: CLB·83 | Modify Memory | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exchange control of two target creatures controlled by different players. If you control neither creature, draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 交换两个目标由不同牌手操控之生物的操控权。如果这两者都不由你操控，则你抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·83 | Modify Memory | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Percival's clothes itched and his dinner was unpleasantly wriggly, but the kobold looked like he was having the time of his life.
trans-unit.target: 博西瓦感觉衣着奇痒异常，晚餐蠕动反胃，而狗头人看起来正在享受当下。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·84 | Moonshae Pixie | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Moonshae Pixie
trans-unit.target: 月影岛皮克精

trans-unit.resname: CLB·84 | Moonshae Pixie | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to the number of opponents who were dealt combat damage this turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓若干牌，其数量等同于本回合中受过战斗伤害的对手数量。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·84 | Pixie Dust | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pixie Dust
trans-unit.target: 皮克精尘

trans-unit.resname: CLB·84 | Pixie Dust | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Up to three target creatures gain flying until end of turn. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)
trans-unit.target: 至多三个目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。（然后放逐此牌。之后你还可以从放逐区施放该生物。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·85 | Mystery Key | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mystery Key
trans-unit.target: 神秘钥匙

trans-unit.resname: CLB·85 | Mystery Key | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice CARDNAME. If you do, draw three cards.\nEquip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，牺牲CARDNAME。若你如此作，则抓三张牌。 佩带{1}（{1}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。只能于法术时机佩带。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·86 | Nimbleclaw Adept | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nimbleclaw Adept
trans-unit.target: 迅爪专家

trans-unit.resname: CLB·86 | Nimbleclaw Adept | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Bigby's Hand — {T}: Untap two other target permanents. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

20 | Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls.

As long as CARDNAME is attached to a creature, you don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.

trans-unit.resname: CLB·143 | Safana, Calimport Cutthroat | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you have the initiative, create a Treasure token. Create three of those tokens instead if you've completed a dungeon.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 威慑 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你握有先制，则派出一个珍宝衍生物。如果你完成过地城，则改为派出三个此类衍生物。 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·144 | Sarevok, Deathbringer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sarevok, Deathbringer
trans-unit.target: 索命鬼王沙洛佛克

trans-unit.resname: CLB·144 | Sarevok, Deathbringer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's end step, if no permanents left the battlefield this turn, that player loses X life, where X is Sarevok's power.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中没有永久物离开战场，则该牌手失去X点生命，X为沙洛佛克的力量。 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·145 | Scion of Halaster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scion of Halaster
trans-unit.target: 海拉斯特的后裔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·145 | Scion of Halaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "The first time you would draw a card each turn, instead look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your graveyard and the other back on top of your library. Then draw a card."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「你每回合中首度将抓一张牌时，改为检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置入你的坟墓场，另一张则放回你的牌库顶。然后抓一张牌。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·145 | Scion of Halaster | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Most see the Mad Mage as a deranged menace, but you recognize the genius behind his paranoia.
trans-unit.target: 你没有盲从大众把疯狂法师视作狂乱威胁，反而看穿了他偏执作风背后的高明之处。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·146 | Shadowheart, Dark Justiciar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shadowheart, Dark Justiciar
trans-unit.target: 暗夜法官影心

trans-unit.resname: CLB·146 | Shadowheart, Dark Justiciar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw X cards, where X is that creature's power.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，{T}，牺牲另一个生物：抓X张牌，X为该生物的力量。 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·146 | Shadowheart, Dark Justiciar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Shar's will shall be done. As sure as night will fall."
trans-unit.target: 「莎尔的意志必得践行。正如夜幕定会降临。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·147 | Sigil of Myrkul | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sigil of Myrkul
trans-unit.target: 米尔寇的印记

trans-unit.resname: CLB·147 | Sigil of Myrkul | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, mill a card. When you do, if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control and it gains deathtouch until end of turn. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，磨一张牌。当你如此作时，若你的坟墓场中有四张或更多生物牌，则在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，且它获得死触异能直到回合结束。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·148 | Sivriss, Nightmare Speaker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sivriss, Nightmare Speaker
trans-unit.target: 梦魇语者希历斯

trans-unit.resname: CLB·148 | Sivriss, Nightmare Speaker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice another creature or an artifact: For each opponent, you mill a card, then return that card from your graveyard to your hand unless that player pays 3 life. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲另一个生物或一个神器：对每位对手而言，你磨一张牌，然后除非该牌手支付3点生命，否则将该牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。） 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·149 | Skullport Merchant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skullport Merchant
trans-unit.target: 头骨港商人

trans-unit.resname: CLB·149 | Skullport Merchant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")\n{1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature or a Treasure: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。） {1}{B}，牺牲另一个生物或一个珍宝：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·149 | Skullport Merchant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Buy something or move along."
trans-unit.target: 「不买东西就别挡道。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·150 | Stirge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stirge
trans-unit.target: 蚊蝠

trans-unit.resname: CLB·150 | Stirge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME can't block.\nBlood Drain — {1}{B}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。 吸血～{1}{B}，支付1点生命，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·150 | Stirge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I will never complain about mosquitos again."\n—Imoen
trans-unit.target: 「我以后再也不抱怨蚊子了。」 ～爱蒙

trans-unit.resname: CLB·151 | Summon Undead | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Summon Undead
trans-unit.target: 召唤不死生物

trans-unit.resname: CLB·151 | Summon Undead | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may mill three cards. Then return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 你可以磨三张牌。然后将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·151 | Summon Undead | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The air itself shuddered at the wizard's words, and from the dark beyond, her call was answered.
trans-unit.target: 随着法师念咒声起，周遭空气开始随之抖动，而黑暗异界也响应了法师的召唤。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·152 | Thieves' Tools | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thieves' Tools
trans-unit.target: 小偷工具

trans-unit.resname: CLB·152 | Thieves' Tools | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")\nEquipped creature can't be blocked as long as its power is 3 or less.\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。） 只要佩带此武具之生物的力量等于或小于3，它便不能被阻挡。 佩带{2}（{2}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。只能于法术时机佩带。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·153 | Topaz Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Topaz Dragon
trans-unit.target: 黄玉龙

trans-unit.resname: CLB·153 | Topaz Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 飞行，死触

trans-unit.resname: CLB·153 | Topaz Dragon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: What its gaze doesn't wither, its breath surely will.
trans-unit.target: 它眼睛瞪不死的东西，吐息准能喷得死。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·153 | Entropic Cloud | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Entropic Cloud
trans-unit.target: 减速毒云

trans-unit.resname: CLB·153 | Entropic Cloud | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物获得死触异能直到回合结束。（然后放逐此牌。之后你还可以从放逐区施放该生物。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·154 | Underdark Explorer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Underdark Explorer
trans-unit.target: 幽暗地域探险家

trans-unit.resname: CLB·154 | Underdark Explorer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.
trans-unit.target: 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，你掌握先制。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·154 | Underdark Explorer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Keep your fancy magic. All I need is a hook and a sturdy length of rope."
trans-unit.target: 「收起你浮夸的魔法吧。我只需要一枚挂钩和一捆结实的长绳。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·155 | Vicious Battlerager | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vicious Battlerager
trans-unit.target: 邪恶战怒者

trans-unit.resname: CLB·155 | Vicious Battlerager | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.\nSpiked Retribution — Whenever CARDNAME becomes blocked by a creature, that creature's controller loses 5 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你掌握先制。 尖刺反击～每当CARDNAME被一个生物阻挡时，该生物的操控者失去5点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·156 | Viconia, Drow Apostate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Viconia, Drow Apostate
trans-unit.target: 变节卓尔维康妮亚

trans-unit.resname: CLB·156 | Viconia, Drow Apostate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard, return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你的坟墓场中有四张或更多生物牌，则随机将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·157 | Vrock | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vrock
trans-unit.target: 弗洛魔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·157 | Vrock | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nToxic Spores — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, each opponent loses 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 剧毒孢子～在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则每位对手各失去3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·157 | Vrock | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Don't try to bribe them. They'll take your gold *and* your liver."\n—Volo's field notes
trans-unit.target: 「别想着贿赂它们。它们会叼走你的钱*还有*你的肝。」 ～沃洛的观察笔记

trans-unit.resname: CLB·158 | Zhentarim Bandit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zhentarim Bandit
trans-unit.target: 散塔林会恶贼

trans-unit.resname: CLB·158 | Zhentarim Bandit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay 1 life. If you do, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以支付1点生命。若你如此作，则派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·158 | Zhentarim Bandit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Zhentarim are ruthless, unscrupulous, and dishonest. But I must admit, they are effective."\n—Commander Liara Portyr
trans-unit.target: 「散塔林会的人无情，无耻，无信。但我必须承认，他们确实好用。」 ～莉瑞亚波提尔指挥官

trans-unit.resname: CLB·159 | Amber Gristle O'Maul | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Amber Gristle O'Maul
trans-unit.target: 安珀葛斯特欧茂尔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·159 | Amber Gristle O'Maul | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw a card for each player being attacked.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以弃掉你的手牌。若你如此作，则每有一位受攻击的牌手，便抓一张牌。 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·160 | Amethyst Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Amethyst Dragon
trans-unit.target: 紫晶龙

trans-unit.resname: CLB·160 | Amethyst Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, haste
trans-unit.target: 飞行，敏捷

trans-unit.resname: CLB·160 | Amethyst Dragon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "At least it's a beautiful way to die."\n—Erinis, gloom stalker
trans-unit.target: 「至少这种死法比较华丽。」 ～幽域追踪者艾琳尼斯

trans-unit.resname: CLB·160 | Explosive Crystal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Explosive Crystal
trans-unit.target: 爆裂水晶

trans-unit.resname: CLB·160 | Explosive Crystal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意数量的目标造成共4点伤害，你可以任意分配。（然后放逐此牌。之后你还可以从放逐区施放该生物。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·161 | Ancient Copper Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ancient Copper Dragon
trans-unit.target: 远古赤铜龙

trans-unit.resname: CLB·161 | Ancient Copper Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. You create a number of Treasure tokens equal to the result.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，掷一颗d20。你派出若干珍宝衍生物，其数量等同于掷骰结果。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·162 | Balor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Balor
trans-unit.target: 巴洛魔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·162 | Balor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Flying
Whenever CARDNAME attacks or dies, choose one or more. Each mode must target a different player.
• Target opponent draws three cards, then discards three cards at random.
• Target opponent sacrifices a nontoken artifact.
• CARDNAME deals damage to target opponent equal to the number of cards in their hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击或死去时，选择一项或多项。每项均须以不同的牌手为目标。 •目标对手抓三张牌，然后随机弃三张牌。 •目标对手牺牲一个非衍生物的神器。 •CARDNAME向目标对手造成等同于其手牌数量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·163 | Bhaal's Invoker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bhaal's Invoker
trans-unit.target: 巴尔的神导士

trans-unit.resname: CLB·163 | Bhaal's Invoker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Scorching Ray — {8}: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: 焦灼射线～{8}：CARDNAME向每位对手各造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·163 | Bhaal's Invoker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Lord of Murder has freed me from the shackles of mortal laws and gifted me with fire to carry out his will."
trans-unit.target: 「谋杀之主将我从凡间桎梏中解放出来，同时赐我火焰实现他的意志。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·164 | Bloodboil Sorcerer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodboil Sorcerer
trans-unit.target: 沸血术士

trans-unit.resname: CLB·164 | Bloodboil Sorcerer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.\nCrown of Madness — {1}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场时，你掌握先制。 疯狂冠冕～{1}{R}，牺牲一个神器或生物：煽惑目标生物。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·165 | Breath Weapon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Breath Weapon
trans-unit.target: 喷息武器

trans-unit.resname: CLB·165 | Breath Weapon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each non-Dragon creature.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个非龙生物各造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·165 | Breath Weapon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In the name of Tempus, Lord of Battles, you will die honorably in righteous fire."
trans-unit.target: 「以战斗之主坦帕斯之名，你将在正义火焰中光荣赴死。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·166 | Carnelian Orb of Dragonkind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Carnelian Orb of Dragonkind
trans-unit.target: 红玉髓龙珠

trans-unit.resname: CLB·166 | Carnelian Orb of Dragonkind | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R}. If that mana is spent on a Dragon creature spell, it gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{R}。如果该法术力用以支付龙生物咒语，则它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·166 | Carnelian Orb of Dragonkind | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The essence of a red dragon burns within, always ready to rise with wrath.
trans-unit.target: 红龙精华在其内燃烧，随时准备喷泻怒火。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·167 | Caves of Chaos Adventurer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Caves of Chaos Adventurer
trans-unit.target: 混沌洞穴冒险家

trans-unit.resname: CLB·167 | Caves of Chaos Adventurer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, exile the top card of your library. If you've completed a dungeon, you may play that card this turn without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, you may play that card this turn.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，你掌握先制。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。如果你完成过地城，则本回合中，你可以使用该牌且不需支付其法术力费用。若否，则本回合中，你可以使用该牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·168 | Coronation of Chaos | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coronation of Chaos
trans-unit.target: 混沌加身

trans-unit.resname: CLB·168 | Coronation of Chaos | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn. Goad them. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 至多三个目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。煽惑它们。（直到你的下一个回合，那些生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·168 | Coronation of Chaos | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When Sarevok's deception was unmasked, the cheering crowd erupted into an outraged mob.
trans-unit.target: 沙洛佛克的骗局被揭穿后，原本欢呼的群众瞬间转变成暴民。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·169 | Descent into Avernus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Descent into Avernus
trans-unit.target: 深入禽绝地狱

trans-unit.resname: CLB·169 | Descent into Avernus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put two descent counters on CARDNAME. Then each player creates X Treasure tokens and CARDNAME deals X damage to each player, where X is the number of descent counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，在CARDNAME上放置两个下行指示物。然后每位牌手各派出X个珍宝衍生物，且CARDNAME对每位牌手各造成X点伤害，X为CARDNAME上的下行指示物数量。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·170 | Dragon Cultist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dragon Cultist
trans-unit.target: 拜龙教徒

trans-unit.resname: CLB·170 | Dragon Cultist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your end step, if a source you controlled dealt 5 or more damage this turn, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「在你的结束步骤开始时，若某个由你操控的来源本回合中造成过5点或更多伤害，则派出一个4/4红色，具飞行异能的龙衍生生物。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·170 | Dragon Cultist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You know that mighty dracoliches will one day rule over this world. For you, that day can't come soon enough.
trans-unit.target: 你深知那位强大的龙巫妖总有一天会统治整个世界。你期盼那天能早日到来。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·171 | Earth Tremor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Earth Tremor
trans-unit.target: 大地震动

trans-unit.resname: CLB·171 | Earth Tremor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the number of lands you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或鹏洛客造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控的地数量。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·171 | Earth Tremor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Every cave-in is Moradin telling you to leave the earth where it is."\n—Halgar, dwarven recluse
trans-unit.target: 「每次塌方都是摩拉丁在告诫：别动大地。」 ～矮人隐士哈尔加

trans-unit.resname: CLB·172 | Elturel Survivors | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elturel Survivors

trans-unit.resname: CLB·172 | Elturel Survivors | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample, myriad\nAs long as CARDNAME is attacking, it gets +X/+0, where X is the number of lands defending player controls.
trans-unit.target: 践踏，繁影 只要CARDNAME正进行攻击，它便得+X/+0，X为由防御牌手操控的地数量。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·172 | Elturel Survivors | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: They fought with the desperate courage of those who have nothing left to lose.
trans-unit.target: 一无所有之后才能一往无前：他们正是抱着这样的勇气在战斗。

trans-unit.source: Fang Dragon
trans-unit.target: 利齿巨龙

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CLB·173 | Fang Dragon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Watch out for its teeth, tail, claws, wings, back, and front."\n—Olga, cavalier
trans-unit.target: 「当心它的尖牙、尾巴、利爪、背面以及正面。」 ～骑士娥勒加

trans-unit.resname: CLB·173 | Forktail Sweep | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forktail Sweep
trans-unit.target: 叉尾扫击

trans-unit.resname: CLB·173 | Forktail Sweep | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each creature you don't control. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个不由你操控的生物各造成1点伤害。（然后放逐此牌。之后你还可以从放逐区施放该生物。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·174 | Firbolg Flutist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Firbolg Flutist
trans-unit.target: 隐逸巨人笛手

trans-unit.resname: CLB·174 | Firbolg Flutist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enthralling Performance — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature you don't control until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste and myriad until end of turn. (Whenever it attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)
trans-unit.target: 醉人表演～当CARDNAME进战场时，获得目标不由你操控之生物的操控权直到回合结束。将它重置。它获得敏捷与繁影异能直到回合结束。（每当它攻击时，对防御牌手之外的每位对手而言，你可以派出一个为该生物复制品的衍生物，其为横置且正向该牌手或某个由他操控的鹏洛客进行攻击。在战斗结束时，放逐这些衍生物。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·175 | Fireball | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fireball
trans-unit.target: 火球

trans-unit.resname: CLB·175 | Fireball | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.\nCARDNAME deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语在第一个目标之外每有一个目标，便增加{1}来施放。 CARDNAME对任意数量的目标各造成伤害，其数量为「将X平均分配，小数点后舍去」。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·175 | Fireball | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The orchard soon reeked of sulfur, smoke, and scorched bugbear, with just a hint of peach.
trans-unit.target: 桃园里很快就弥漫起硫磺、烟雾与烧焦熊哥布林的气味，还夹杂着一丝桃子的果香。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·179 | Guild Artisan | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Your discerning eye for value makes you nearly impossible to swindle.
trans-unit.target: 你眼光犀利，能够准确鉴别物品价值，令你几乎不会受骗。

trans-unit.source:
Whenever CARDNAME attacks, roll a d20.
1–9 | Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
10–19 | Create two Treasure tokens.
20 | Create three Treasure tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，掷一颗d20。 1～9 | 派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。） 10～19 | 派出两个珍宝衍生物。 20 | 派出三个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.source: "Sure, you can help me calibrate the aiming mechanism. Stand over there."

When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, search your library for up to two basic land cards and reveal them, then roll a d20.
1–9 | Put those cards into your hand, then shuffle.
10–19 | Put one of those cards onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
20 | Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，从你牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌并展示之，然后掷一颗d20。 1～9 | 将这些牌置于你手上，然后洗牌。 10～19 | 将这些牌其中一张横置放进战场，另一张则置于你手上，然后洗牌。 20 | 将这些牌横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·254 | Silvanus's Invoker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Conjure Elemental — {8}: Untap target land you control. It becomes an 8/8 Elemental creature with trample and haste until end of turn. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: 召唤元素生物～{8}：重置目标由你操控的地。它成为8/8，具践踏与敏捷异能的元素生物直到回合结束。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·254 | Silvanus's Invoker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Arise, friend, and seize the horizon in the name of the Oak Father."
trans-unit.target: 「起身，朋友，以橡树之父为名夺回边界。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·255 | Skanos Dragonheart | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skanos Dragonheart
trans-unit.target: 尚诺斯龙心

trans-unit.resname: CLB·255 | Skanos Dragonheart | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among other Dragons you control and Dragon cards in your graveyard.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，它得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为由你操控之其他龙与你坟墓场内龙牌中的最大力量。 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·256 | Skullwinder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skullwinder
trans-unit.target: 颅骨响尾蛇

trans-unit.resname: CLB·256 | Skullwinder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target card from your graveyard to your hand, then choose an opponent. That player returns a card from their graveyard to their hand.
trans-unit.target: 死触 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上，然后选择一位对手。该牌手将一张牌从其坟墓场移回其手上。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·257 | Split the Spoils | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Split the Spoils
trans-unit.target: 分割战利品

trans-unit.resname: CLB·257 | Split the Spoils | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile up to five target permanent cards from your graveyard and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. (Piles can be empty.)
trans-unit.target: 将至多五张目标永久物牌从你的坟墓场放逐，并分为两堆。由任一对手选择其中一堆。将该堆牌置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。（牌堆可以是空的。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·257 | Split the Spoils | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "That half is yours. These halves are mine."
trans-unit.target: 「那半份归你。这几半归我。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·258 | Traverse the Outlands | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Traverse the Outlands
trans-unit.target: 遍游远境

trans-unit.resname: CLB·258 | Traverse the Outlands | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻至多X张基本地牌，X为由你操控之生物中的最大力量。将这些牌横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·258 | Traverse the Outlands | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "By the time you've seen it all, all have already changed."\n—Wandering treant, name unknown
trans-unit.target: 「待你见过万物，万物均已生变。」 ～佚名漂泊树人

trans-unit.resname: CLB·259 | Undercellar Myconid | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Undercellar Myconid
trans-unit.target: 地下窖蕈人

trans-unit.resname: CLB·259 | Undercellar Myconid | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或死去时，派出一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生生物。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·259 | Undercellar Myconid | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Water, barley, yeast, darkness—the tavern cellar had everything a growing mold could need.
trans-unit.target: 水源、大麦、酵母、黑暗～酒馆地窖有霉菌生长所需的一切。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·260 | Undermountain Adventurer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Undermountain Adventurer
trans-unit.target: 地脉迷城冒险家

trans-unit.resname: CLB·260 | Undermountain Adventurer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.\n{T}: Add {G}{G}. If you've completed a dungeon, add six {G} instead.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 当CARDNAME进战场时，你掌握先制。 {T}：加{G}{G}。如果你完成过地城，则改为加六点{G}。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·261 | Wilson, Refined Grizzly | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wilson, Refined Grizzly
trans-unit.target: 优雅灰熊威尔逊

trans-unit.resname: CLB·261 | Wilson, Refined Grizzly | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
This spell can't be countered.
Vigilance, reach, trample
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。 警戒，延势，践踏 守护{2}（每当此生物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{2}，否则反击之。） 选择身世（你能用一个身世当作第二指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·262 | You Look Upon the Tarrasque | Card Name
trans-unit.source: You Look Upon the Tarrasque
trans-unit.target: 你抬眼一瞥末日毁灭兽

trans-unit.resname: CLB·262 | You Look Upon the Tarrasque | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Run and Hide — Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.\n• Gather Your Courage — Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains indestructible until end of turn. All creatures your opponents control able to block that creature this turn do so.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •逃避躲藏～于本回合中，防止将对你与由你操控之生物造成的所有伤害。 •鼓起勇气～直到回合结束，目标生物得+5/+5且获得不灭异能。本回合中，所有由对手操控的生物若能阻挡该生物，则皆须阻挡之。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·263 | You Meet in a Tavern | Card Name
trans-unit.source: You Meet in a Tavern
trans-unit.target: 你在酒馆遇见他人

trans-unit.resname: CLB·263 | You Meet in a Tavern | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Form a Party — Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.\n• Start a Brawl — Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •组成团队～检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以展示其中任意数量的生物牌，并将它们置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。 •互相争斗～由你操控的生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·264 | Alaundo the Seer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Alaundo the Seer
trans-unit.target: 先知阿兰多

trans-unit.resname: CLB·264 | Alaundo the Seer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand and put a number of time counters on it equal to its mana value. It gains "When the last time counter is removed from this card, if it's exiled, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you cast a creature spell this way, it gains haste until end of turn." Then remove a time counter from each other card you own in exile.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后从你手上放逐一张牌，并在其上放置若干计时指示物，其数量等同于其法术力值。它获得「当从此牌上移去最后一个计时指示物时，若它已放逐，则你可以施放它且不需支付其法术力费用。若你以此法施放生物咒语，则它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。」然后从放逐区中每张由你拥有的其他牌上各移去一个计时指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·265 | Astarion, the Decadent | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Astarion, the Decadent
trans-unit.target: 颓废的阿斯代伦

trans-unit.resname: CLB·265 | Astarion, the Decadent | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Deathtouch, lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, choose one —
• Feed — Target opponent loses life equal to the amount of life they lost this turn.
• Friends — You gain life equal to the amount of life you gained this turn.
trans-unit.target: 死触，系命 在你的结束步骤开始时，选择一项～ •相食～目标对手失去若干生命，其数量等同于他本回合中失去过的生命数量。 •相伴～你获得若干生命，其数量等同于你本回合中获得过的生命数量。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·266 | Baba Lysaga, Night Witch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Baba Lysaga, Night Witch
trans-unit.target: 暗夜女巫芭芭莱萨迦

trans-unit.resname: CLB·266 | Baba Lysaga, Night Witch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice up to three permanents: If there were three or more card types among the sacrificed permanents, each opponent loses 3 life, you gain 3 life, and you draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲至多三个永久物：如果所牺牲的永久物中包括三种或更多牌张类别，则每位对手各失去3点生命，你获得3点生命，且你抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·266 | Baba Lysaga, Night Witch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Better the cold night than her warm hospitality.
trans-unit.target: 宁可置身寒夜，也不要接受她的热情。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·267 | Bane, Lord of Darkness | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bane, Lord of Darkness
trans-unit.target: 黑暗之主班恩

trans-unit.resname: CLB·267 | Bane, Lord of Darkness | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, CARDNAME has indestructible.\nWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, target opponent may have you draw a card. If they don't, you may put a creature card with equal or lesser toughness from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的总生命等于或小于你起始总生命的一半，CARDNAME便具有不灭异能。 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，目标对手可以令你抓一张牌。若他未如此作，则你可以将一张防御力相等或较小的生物牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·268 | Bhaal, Lord of Murder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bhaal, Lord of Murder
trans-unit.target: 谋杀之主巴尔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·268 | Bhaal, Lord of Murder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, CARDNAME has indestructible.\nWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and goad it.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的总生命等于或小于你起始总生命的一半，CARDNAME便具有不灭异能。 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物并煽惑它。

trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, for each token you control, create a 1/1 white Rabbit creature token.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你每操控一个衍生物，便派出一个1/1白色的兔衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·269 | Cadira, Caller of the Small | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She roams the border between wilderness and civilization, protecting those who need it most.
trans-unit.target: 她梭巡荒野与文明的边界，保护最需要庇护的生灵。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·270 | Commander Liara Portyr | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 莉瑞亚波提尔指挥官

trans-unit.resname: CLB·270 | Commander Liara Portyr | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, spells you cast from exile this turn cost {X} less to cast, where X is the number of players being attacked. Exile the top X cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，本回合中，你从放逐区施放的咒语减少{X}来施放，X为受攻击的牌手数量。放逐你牌库顶的X张牌。直到回合结束，你可以从所放逐的牌之中施放咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·270 | Commander Liara Portyr | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's a ghoul-eat-you world out there. Follow my orders if you want to survive."
trans-unit.target: 「外面是一个鬼吃人的世界。要想活命就得听我号令。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·271 | The Council of Four | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Council of Four
trans-unit.target: 四人议会

trans-unit.resname: CLB·271 | The Council of Four | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player draws their second card during their turn, you draw a card.\nWhenever a player casts their second spell during their turn, you create a 2/2 white Knight creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手于其回合中抓他的第二张牌时，你抓一张牌。 每当任一牌手于其回合中施放他的第二个咒语时，你派出一个2/2白色骑士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·271 | The Council of Four | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ambition has a price in Baldur's Gate, and it is paid to the Council.
trans-unit.target: 在博德之门怀抱壮志雄心得付出点代价；这代价要付给四人议会。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·272 | Duke Ulder Ravengard | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 乌尔德瑞文嘉德公爵

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature you control gains haste and myriad until end of turn. (Whenever it attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，另一个目标由你操控的生物获得敏捷与繁影异能直到回合结束。（每当它攻击时，对防御牌手之外的每位对手而言，你可以派出一个为该生物复制品的衍生物，其为横置且正向该牌手或某个由他操控的鹏洛客进行攻击。在战斗结束时，放逐这些衍生物。）

trans-unit.target: 敏捷 你可以将由你操控的其他生物视同它们具有敏捷异能地来起动其异能。 {T}：本回合中，当你下一次支付四点或更多法术力来起动异能时，复制该异能。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.source:
Whenever you scry, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is the number of cards looked at while scrying this way.
+2: Draw a card, then scry 2.
−3: Exile the top card of your library. Create a number of 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature tokens with flying equal to that card's mana value.
CARDNAME can be your commander.

trans-unit.target: 飞行 在你的结束步骤开始时，选择一位牌手。他在一个由其操控的生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。选择另一位牌手令其抓一张牌。再选择第三位牌手令其派出两个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·276 | Gorion, Wise Mentor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You are safest in Candlekeep, Abdel, but I cannot keep you from the world forever."
trans-unit.target: 「阿波戴尔，你待在烛堡里最为安全，但我也不能让你永远与世隔绝。」

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, target opponent gains control of up to one target creature you control. Put two +1/+1 counters on it and tap it. It's goaded for the rest of the game and it gains "This creature can't be sacrificed." (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)\nWhenever a creature you own but don't control attacks, you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，目标对手获得至多一个目标由你操控之生物的操控权。在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物并横置它。它在本盘游戏接下来的时段均已煽惑，且它获得「此生物不能被牺牲。」（它每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。） 每当一个由你拥有但不由你操控的生物攻击时，你抓一张牌。

(Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)\nOnce during each of your turns, you may play a land or cast a permanent spell from among cards in your graveyard that were put there from your library this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，它获得死触异能直到回合结束。磨两张牌。（将你牌库顶的两张牌置入你的坟墓场。） 仅于你的每个回合中且限一次，你可以从本回合自你牌库进入你坟墓场的牌之中使用一个地或施放一个永久物咒语。

trans-unit.source: Korlessa, Scale Singer

trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。 你可以从你的牌库顶施放龙咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·280 | Korlessa, Scale Singer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Would you like a song of wing-wind and fire, or one of gentle heartbeats atop a golden hoard?"
trans-unit.target: 「你是想听一曲翼风烈火交织的激情乐曲，还是坐拥金银财宝的抒情小调？」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·281 | Lozhan, Dragons' Legacy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you cast an Adventure or Dragon spell, CARDNAME deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to any target that isn't a commander.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你施放历险咒语或龙咒语时，CARDNAME对任意一个不为指挥官的目标造成伤害，其数量等同于该咒语的法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·281 | Lozhan, Dragons' Legacy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She channels myth and memory into waves of deadly arcane force.
trans-unit.target: 她通联传说与回忆，将其交织为络绎不绝的致命奥术之力。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·282 | Mahadi, Emporium Master | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mahadi, Emporium Master
trans-unit.target: 货棚老板马哈迪

trans-unit.resname: CLB·282 | Mahadi, Emporium Master | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, create a Treasure token for each creature that died this turn. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，本回合中每有一个生物死去，便派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·282 | Mahadi, Emporium Master | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Welcome to the Wandering Emporium. Feel free to browse the bazaar. We have everything a lost soul could want, need, or afford."
trans-unit.target: 「欢迎来到漫流货棚。市集敬请自由参观。但凡失落灵魂会要、需要或要得起的东西，我们都有。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·283 | Mazzy, Truesword Paladin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mazzy, Truesword Paladin
trans-unit.target: 真剑圣武士麦琪

trans-unit.resname: CLB·283 | Mazzy, Truesword Paladin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever an enchanted creature attacks one of your opponents, it gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.\nWhenever an Aura you control is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile it. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast that card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个受有灵气的生物攻击你的任一对手时，直到回合结束，它得+2/+0且获得践踏异能。 每当一个由你操控的灵气从战场进入你的坟墓场时，将它放逐。直到你下一个回合的回合结束，你可以施放该牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·284 | Miirym, Sentinel Wyrm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Miirym, Sentinel Wyrm
trans-unit.target: 上古龙卫米瑞穆

trans-unit.resname: CLB·284 | Miirym, Sentinel Wyrm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, ward {2}\nWhenever another nontoken Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, create a token that's a copy of it, except the token isn't legendary if that Dragon is legendary.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，守护{2} 每当另一个非衍生物的龙在你操控下进战场时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为前者的复制品，但如果该龙是传奇，则此衍生物不是传奇。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·285 | Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes
trans-unit.target: 历时英雄明斯克与布布

trans-unit.resname: CLB·285 | Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may create Boo, a legendary 1/1 red Hamster creature token with trample and haste.
+1: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature with trample or haste.
−2: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, CARDNAME deals X damage to any target, where X is that creature's power. If the sacrificed creature was a Hamster, draw X cards.
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场和在你的维持开始时，你可以派出传奇衍生生物布布，其为1/1红色，具践踏与敏捷异能的仓鼠。 +1：在至多一个目标具践踏或敏捷异能的生物上放置三个+1/+1指示物。 -2：牺牲一个生物。当你如此作时，CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成X点伤害，X为该生物的力量。如果所牺牲的生物是仓鼠，则抓X张牌。 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·286 | Minthara, Merciless Soul | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Minthara, Merciless Soul
trans-unit.target: 冷酷无情的明萨拉

trans-unit.resname: CLB·286 | Minthara, Merciless Soul | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Ward {X}, where X is the number of experience counters you have.\nAt the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you get an experience counter.\nCreatures you control get +1/+0 for each experience counter you have.
trans-unit.target: 守护{X}，X为你具有的经验指示物数量。 在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则你得到一个经验指示物。 你每有一个经验指示物，由你操控的生物便得+1/+0。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·287 | Myrkul, Lord of Bones | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Myrkul, Lord of Bones
trans-unit.target: 骸骨之主米尔寇

trans-unit.resname: CLB·287 | Myrkul, Lord of Bones | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, CARDNAME has indestructible.\nWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's an enchantment and loses all other card types.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的总生命等于或小于你起始总生命的一半，CARDNAME便具有不灭异能。 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以将它放逐。若你如此作，则派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该牌的复制品，但它是结界且失去所有其他牌张类别。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·288 | Neera, Wild Mage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Neera, Wild Mage
trans-unit.target: 狂野法师妮拉

trans-unit.resname: CLB·288 | Neera, Wild Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell, you may put it on the bottom of its owner's library. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. This ability triggers only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放咒语时，你可以将它置于其拥有者的牌库底。若你如此作，则从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·289 | Nine-Fingers Keene | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nine-Fingers Keene
trans-unit.target: 九指姬恩

trans-unit.resname: CLB·289 | Nine-Fingers Keene | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Menace
Ward—
Pay 9 life.
Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, look at the top nine cards of your library. You may put a Gate card from among them onto the battlefield. Then if you control nine or more Gates, put the rest into your hand. Otherwise, put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 威慑 守护～支付9点生命。 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，检视你牌库顶的九张牌。你可以将其中一张门牌放进战场。然后如果你操控九个或更多门，其余的牌则置于你手上。若否，则以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·290 | Oji, the Exquisite Blade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oji, the Exquisite Blade
trans-unit.target: 精刻利刃欧寄

trans-unit.resname: CLB·290 | Oji, the Exquisite Blade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and scry 2.\nWhenever you cast your second spell each turn, exile up to one target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得2点生命且占卜2。 每当你施放每回合中你的第二个咒语时，放逐至多一个目标由你操控的生物，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·290 | Oji, the Exquisite Blade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: They walk the Path of Kensei with perfect balance.
trans-unit.target: 他以绝对平衡完美通过剑圣之途。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·291 | Raggadragga, Goreguts Boss | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Raggadragga, Goreguts Boss
trans-unit.target: 蛮血帮首脑拉噶达噶

trans-unit.resname: CLB·291 | Raggadragga, Goreguts Boss | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control with a mana ability gets +2/+2.\nWhenever a creature you control with a mana ability attacks, untap it.\nWhenever you cast a spell, if at least seven mana was spent to cast it, untap target creature. It gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控且具法术力异能的生物均得+2/+2。 每当一个由你操控且具法术力异能的生物攻击时，将它重置。 每当你施放咒语，若施放它时支付过至少七点法术力，则重置目标生物。直到回合结束，它得+7/+7且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·292 | Raphael, Fiendish Savior | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Raphael, Fiendish Savior
trans-unit.target: 炼狱救星拉斐尔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·292 | Raphael, Fiendish Savior | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nOther Demons, Devils, Imps, and Tieflings you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink.\nAt the beginning of each end step, if a creature card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
trans-unit.target: 飞行 由你操控的其他恶魔、魔鬼、小恶魔和魔人得+1/+1且具有系命异能。 在每个结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有生物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场，则派出一个1/1红色魔鬼衍生生物，且具有「当此生物死去时，它对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·293 | Rilsa Rael, Kingpin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rilsa Rael, Kingpin
trans-unit.target: 罪犯头目莉尔萨蕾尔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·293 | Rilsa Rael, Kingpin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.\nWhenever you attack, target attacking creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. If you've completed a dungeon, that creature also gets +5/+0 and gains first strike and menace until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 死触 当CARDNAME进战场时，你掌握先制。 每当你攻击时，目标进行攻击的生物获得死触异能直到回合结束。如果你完成过地城，则直到回合结束，该生物再得+5/+0且获得先攻与威慑异能。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·294 | Tasha, the Witch Queen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tasha, the Witch Queen
trans-unit.target: 巫后塔莎

trans-unit.resname: CLB·294 | Tasha, the Witch Queen | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Whenever you cast a spell you don't own, create a 3/3 black Demon creature token.
+1: Draw a card. For each opponent, exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard and put a page counter on it.
−3: You may cast a spell from among cards in exile with page counters on them without paying its mana cost.
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放不由你拥有的咒语时，派出一个3/3黑色恶魔衍生生物。 +1：抓一张牌。为每位对手各进行以下流程～将至多一张目标瞬间或法术牌从该牌手的坟墓场放逐，并在其上放置一个书页指示物。 −3：你可以从放逐区里其上有书页指示物的牌之中施放一个咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·295 | Thrakkus the Butcher | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 屠夫斯拉库斯

trans-unit.resname: CLB·295 | Thrakkus the Butcher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, double the power of each Dragon you control until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当CARDNAME攻击时，将每个由你操控之龙的力量加倍直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·295 | Thrakkus the Butcher | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Somehow, he never seems to run out of fresh meat.
trans-unit.target: 不知为何，他的鲜肉从来未曾缺货。

trans-unit.source: Haste\n{2}, {T}: When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets a single opponent or a single permanent an opponent controls this turn, for each other opponent, choose that player or a permanent they control, copy that spell, and the copy targets the chosen player or permanent.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 {2}，{T}：本回合中，当你下一次施放以单一对手或单一由对手操控的永久物为目标的瞬间或法术咒语时，对每位其他对手而言，你选择该牌手或一个由其操控的永久物并复制该咒语，且该复制品须以所选牌手或永久物为目标。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·297 | Arcane Encyclopedia | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arcane Encyclopedia
trans-unit.target: 秘法全书

trans-unit.resname: CLB·297 | Arcane Encyclopedia | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: CLB·297 | Arcane Encyclopedia | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A quill from the First Reader at Candlekeep, the spectacles of the Most Holy Servant of Gond, a woven bookmark from the Caleph Arcane of Calimport: readers always leave something of themselves behind.
trans-unit.target: 烛堡第一阅读者留下的羽毛笔，贡德最神圣仆从留下的眼镜，卡林港的凯利弗奥术师留下的布质书签：这本书的读者总是会留下一样身边之物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·298 | Arcane Signet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arcane Signet
trans-unit.target: 秘法印记

trans-unit.resname: CLB·298 | Arcane Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任一颜色。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·298 | Arcane Signet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To feel no constraint but the four points of a compass, to tread a path that only you can find . . . these are the flavors of power I've learned to savor."\n—Keon, horizon walker
trans-unit.target: 「不受任何拘束，跟随罗盘四方指向，闯出一条只有自己能开辟的道路…这些正是我学会品味的力量滋味。」 ～边界行者奇安

trans-unit.source: Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.\n{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.\n{4}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return all cards exiled with CARDNAME to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当你弃一张牌时，将该牌从你的坟墓场放逐。 {2}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。 {4}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：将所有以CARDNAME放逐的牌移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·299 | Bag of Holding | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: CLB·300 | Basilisk Collar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some patriars pay massive sums for exotic pets that can give their posh, predictable lives an edge of danger.
trans-unit.target: 有些贵族舍得花上大钱来购买珍奇宠物，好在自己奢华而一成不变的生活中体会些许危险。

trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有繁影异能。（每当它攻击时，对防御牌手之外的每位对手而言，你可以派出一个为该生物复制品的衍生物，其为横置且正向该牌手或某个由他操控的鹏洛客进行攻击。在战斗结束时，放逐这些衍生物。） 佩带{4}

trans-unit.source: First discovered in ancient Netheril, chardalyn stones absorb and hold magical energy, enabling constructs to be infused with fearsome power and unnatural malice.
trans-unit.target: 卡达林魔晶最早是在远古的耐瑟瑞尔帝国领地上被人发现。这类晶石能够吸收并储存魔法能量，从而让构装生物拥有恐怖力量与超凡恶意。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, you draw two cards and each opponent draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME离开战场时，你抓两张牌且每位对手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·308 | Clockwork Fox | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It might just be my greatest invention yet: A lovable pet that *decreases* the need for chores!"\n—Jan Jansen
trans-unit.target: 「这或许是我迄今为止最伟大的发明：一个*不怎么需要*照顾的可爱宠物！」 ～姚恩姚森

trans-unit.resname: CLB·309 | Decanter of Endless Water | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Decanter of Endless Water
trans-unit.target: 无尽水源

trans-unit.resname: CLB·309 | Decanter of Endless Water | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 你的手牌数量没有上限。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·309 | Decanter of Endless Water | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Now, remember: Under no circumstances should you utter the word 'geyser' in the same room as—oh, blast it!"\n—Bindlehaim, Upper City merchant
trans-unit.target: 「现在给我记住：『喷发』这两个字无论如何都不要在房间里有～糟糕！」 ～上城区商人宾德海姆

trans-unit.resname: CLB·310 | Dire Mimic | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dire Mimic
trans-unit.target: 凶暴拟身怪

trans-unit.resname: CLB·310 | Dire Mimic | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\n{T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Add one mana of any color.\n{3}: CARDNAME becomes a Shapeshifter artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：加一点任意颜色的法术力。 {3}：CARDNAME成为基础力量与防御力为5/5的变形兽神器生物直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·310 | Dire Mimic | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes the closet *is* the monster.
trans-unit.target: 有时候，壁橱*本身*就是怪物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·311 | Drillworks Mole | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drillworks Mole
trans-unit.target: 钻机鼹鼠

trans-unit.resname: CLB·311 | Drillworks Mole | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME and a +1/+1 counter on up to one target commander creature you control.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/1指示物，并在至多一个目标由你操控的指挥官生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·311 | Drillworks Mole | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Flaming Fist soldiers prepared to face a bulette, or worse, but the cause of the rumblings turned out to be much more benign and bizarre.
trans-unit.target: 焰拳佣兵原本已准备好迎战鲨蜥兽或更可怕的怪物，但没料到隆响的源头竟是更怪诞的无害之物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·312 | Dungeoneer's Pack | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dungeoneer's Pack
trans-unit.target: 地城专家背包

trans-unit.resname: CLB·312 | Dungeoneer's Pack | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{2}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: You take the initiative, gain 3 life, draw a card, and create a Treasure token. Activate only as a sorcery. (A Treasure token is an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {2}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：你掌握先制，获得3点生命，抓一张牌并派出一个珍宝衍生物。只能于法术时机起动。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.target: 焰红钻石

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{R}。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·313 | Fire Diamond | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Every facet aglow like iron in Moradin's mighty forge.
trans-unit.target: 每面都像穆拉丁大型熔炉的通红铁块。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·314 | Fraying Line | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fraying Line
trans-unit.target: 有损绳索

trans-unit.resname: CLB·314 | Fraying Line | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a rope counter on target creature you control.\nAt the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may pay {2}. If they do, they put a rope counter on a creature they control. Otherwise, exile CARDNAME and each creature without a rope counter on it, then remove all rope counters from all creatures.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个绳索指示物。 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手可以支付{2}。若他如此作，则他在一个由其操控的生物上放置一个绳索指示物。若否，则放逐CARDNAME和每个其上没有绳索指示物的生物，然后移去所有生物上的所有绳索指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·315 | Gate Colossus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gate Colossus
trans-unit.target: 城门巨像

trans-unit.resname: CLB·315 | Gate Colossus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Gate you control.\nCARDNAME can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.\nWhenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, you may put CARDNAME from your graveyard on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个门，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。 CARDNAME不能被力量等于或小于2的生物阻挡。 每当一个门在你的操控下进战场时，你可以将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·316 | Geode Golem | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Geode Golem
trans-unit.target: 晶岩魔像

trans-unit.resname: CLB·316 | Geode Golem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may cast your commander from the command zone without paying its mana cost. (You still pay any additional costs.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以从统帅区施放你的指挥官，且不需支付其法术力费用。（你依旧要支付额外费用。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·317 | Iron Mastiff | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Iron Mastiff
trans-unit.target: 钢铁獒犬

trans-unit.resname: CLB·317 | Iron Mastiff | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Whenever CARDNAME attacks, roll a d20 for each player being attacked and ignore all but the highest roll.
1–9 | CARDNAME deals damage equal to its power to you.
10–19 | CARDNAME deals damage equal to its power to defending player.
20 | CARDNAME deals damage equal to its power to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，掷等同于受攻击之牌手数量的d20并忽略除最高点数以外的其他结果。 1～9 | CARDNAME对你造成等同于其力量的伤害。 10～19 | CARDNAME对防御牌手造成等同于其力量的伤害。 20 | CARDNAME向每位对手各造成等同于其力量的伤害。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color.\n{4}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you don't put the card onto the battlefield, you may put it on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。 {4}，{T}：检视你的牌库顶牌。如果它是地牌，则你可以将之横置放进战场。若你未将该牌放进战场，则你可以将它置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·319 | Manifold Key | Flavor Text
