trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{C}.\n{2}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Exile any number of target players' graveyards. Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}{C}。 {2}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：放逐任意数量目标牌手的坟墓场。抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·338 | Stonespeaker Crystal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It whispers words spoken centuries ago, coaxing wisdom from the ghosts of civilizations past.
trans-unit.target: 它低语着数世纪前的言辞，试图套取过往文明魂灵的智慧。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·339 | Swiftfoot Boots | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swiftfoot Boots
trans-unit.target: 疾行靴

trans-unit.resname: CLB·339 | Swiftfoot Boots | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)\nEquip {1}
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有辟邪与敏捷异能。（它不能成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标。） 佩带{1}

trans-unit.resname: CLB·339 | Swiftfoot Boots | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: One who wears magical *boots of striding and springing* can jump astounding distances.
trans-unit.target: 奇物*跑跳靴*能让穿戴者跳得更高更远。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·340 | Trailblazer's Torch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Trailblazer's Torch
trans-unit.target: 开拓者火炬

trans-unit.resname: CLB·340 | Trailblazer's Torch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.\nWhenever equipped creature becomes blocked, it deals 2 damage to each creature blocking it.\nEquip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你掌握先制。 每当佩带此武具的生物被阻挡时，它对每个阻挡它的生物各造成2点伤害。 佩带{1}（{1}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。只能于法术时机佩带。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·341 | Treasure Keeper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Treasure Keeper
trans-unit.target: 宝藏守卫

trans-unit.resname: CLB·341 | Treasure Keeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张法术力值等于或小于3的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所有以此法展示且未施放的牌依随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·342 | Universal Solvent | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Universal Solvent
trans-unit.target: 万溶剂

trans-unit.resname: CLB·342 | Universal Solvent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {7}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target permanent.
trans-unit.target: {7}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：消灭目标永久物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·342 | Universal Solvent | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A few drops could dissolve the webs of Lolth herself.
trans-unit.target: 就连罗丝本尊的蛛丝都只消数滴就能溶解。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·343 | Vexing Puzzlebox | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vexing Puzzlebox
trans-unit.target: 乱心魔盒

trans-unit.resname: CLB·343 | Vexing Puzzlebox | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you roll one or more dice, put a number of charge counters on CARDNAME equal to the result.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color. Roll a d20.\n{T}, Remove 100 charge counters from CARDNAME: Search your library for an artifact card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 每当你掷一颗或数颗骰子时，在CARDNAME上放置若干充电指示物，其数量等同于掷骰结果。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。掷一颗d20。 {T}，从CARDNAME上移去100个充电指示物：从你牌库中搜寻一张神器牌，将该牌放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·344 | Wayfarer's Bauble | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Druids hold certain plants to be sacred and use their leaves and wood as a spellcasting focus.
trans-unit.target: 德鲁伊视特定种类的植物为圣物，会用其落叶与枝条当作法器。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·345 | Baldur's Gate | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 「我当然知道『以他为名』是什么意思！但这不是以他之门啊。」 ～城门守卫克力兹

trans-unit.source: An imposing visage that looms over all who would rise above their station.

trans-unit.target: 仆人们细心地照料着花园，确保上城区的居民不会被大自然杂乱无章的一面坏了心情。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·362 | Elminster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elminster
trans-unit.target: 伊尔明斯特

trans-unit.resname: CLB·362 | Elminster | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Whenever you scry, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is the number of cards looked at while scrying this way.
+2: Draw a card, then scry 2.
−3: Exile the top card of your library. Create a number of 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature tokens with flying equal to that card's mana value.
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: 每当你占卜时，你本回合中施放的下一个瞬间或法术咒语减少{X}来施放，X为以此法占卜期间所检视的牌张数量。 +2：抓一张牌，然后占卜2。 -3：放逐你的牌库顶牌。派出若干1/1蓝色，具飞行异能的仙灵／龙衍生生物，其数量等同于该牌的法术力值。 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·363 | Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes
trans-unit.target: 历时英雄明斯克与布布

trans-unit.resname: CLB·363 | Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may create Boo, a legendary 1/1 red Hamster creature token with trample and haste.
+1: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature with trample or haste.
−2: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, CARDNAME deals X damage to any target, where X is that creature's power. If the sacrificed creature was a Hamster, draw X cards.
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场和在你的维持开始时，你可以派出传奇衍生生物布布，其为1/1红色，具践踏与敏捷异能的仓鼠。 +1：在至多一个目标具践踏或敏捷异能的生物上放置三个+1/+1指示物。 -2：牺牲一个生物。当你如此作时，CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成X点伤害，X为该生物的力量。如果所牺牲的生物是仓鼠，则抓X张牌。 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·364 | Tasha, the Witch Queen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tasha, the Witch Queen
trans-unit.target: 巫后塔莎

trans-unit.resname: CLB·364 | Tasha, the Witch Queen | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Whenever you cast a spell you don't own, create a 3/3 black Demon creature token.
+1: Draw a card. For each opponent, exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard and put a page counter on it.
−3: You may cast a spell from among cards in exile with page counters on them without paying its mana cost.
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放不由你拥有的咒语时，派出一个3/3黑色恶魔衍生生物。 +1：抓一张牌。为每位对手各进行以下流程～将至多一张目标瞬间或法术牌从该牌手的坟墓场放逐，并在其上放置一个书页指示物。 −3：你可以从放逐区里其上有书页指示物的牌之中施放一个咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，掷一颗d20。你派出若干1/1蓝色，具飞行异能的仙灵／龙衍生生物，其数量等同于掷骰结果。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·366 | Ancient Silver Dragon | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 远古银龙

trans-unit.resname: CLB·366 | Ancient Silver Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. Draw cards equal to the result. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，掷一颗d20。抓等同于掷骰结果的牌。在本盘游戏接下来的时段，你的手牌数量没有上限。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·367 | Ancient Brass Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ancient Brass Dragon
trans-unit.target: 远古黄铜龙

trans-unit.resname: CLB·367 | Ancient Brass Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 蛮血帮首脑拉噶达噶

trans-unit.resname: CLB·437 | Raggadragga, Goreguts Boss | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control with a mana ability gets +2/+2.\nWhenever a creature you control with a mana ability attacks, untap it.\nWhenever you cast a spell, if at least seven mana was spent to cast it, untap target creature. It gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控且具法术力异能的生物均得+2/+2。 每当一个由你操控且具法术力异能的生物攻击时，将它重置。 每当你施放咒语，若施放它时支付过至少七点法术力，则重置目标生物。直到回合结束，它得+7/+7且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·438 | Raphael, Fiendish Savior | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Raphael, Fiendish Savior
trans-unit.target: 炼狱救星拉斐尔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·438 | Raphael, Fiendish Savior | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nOther Demons, Devils, Imps, and Tieflings you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink.\nAt the beginning of each end step, if a creature card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
trans-unit.target: 飞行 由你操控的其他恶魔、魔鬼、小恶魔和魔人得+1/+1且具有系命异能。 在每个结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有生物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场，则派出一个1/1红色魔鬼衍生生物，且具有「当此生物死去时，它对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·439 | Rilsa Rael, Kingpin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rilsa Rael, Kingpin
trans-unit.target: 罪犯头目莉尔萨蕾尔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·439 | Rilsa Rael, Kingpin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.\nWhenever you attack, target attacking creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. If you've completed a dungeon, that creature also gets +5/+0 and gains first strike and menace until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 死触 当CARDNAME进战场时，你掌握先制。 每当你攻击时，目标进行攻击的生物获得死触异能直到回合结束。如果你完成过地城，则直到回合结束，该生物再得+5/+0且获得先攻与威慑异能。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·440 | Thrakkus the Butcher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thrakkus the Butcher
trans-unit.target: 屠夫斯拉库斯

trans-unit.resname: CLB·440 | Thrakkus the Butcher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, double the power of each Dragon you control until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当CARDNAME攻击时，将每个由你操控之龙的力量加倍直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·441 | Zevlor, Elturel Exile | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Haste\n{2}, {T}: When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets a single opponent or a single permanent an opponent controls this turn, for each other opponent, choose that player or a permanent they control, copy that spell, and the copy targets the chosen player or permanent.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 {2}，{T}：本回合中，当你下一次施放以单一对手或单一由对手操控的永久物为目标的瞬间或法术咒语时，对每位其他对手而言，你选择该牌手或一个由其操控的永久物并复制该咒语，且该复制品须以所选牌手或永久物为目标。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·451 | Plains | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plains
trans-unit.target: 平原

trans-unit.resname: CLB·451 | Plains | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You've heard rumors of bandits along the Coast Way, but your journey so far has even surprisingly uneventful.
trans-unit.target: 你听说湾岸公路沿途强盗肆虐，但是旅程至今竟一直太平无事。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·452 | Plains | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plains
trans-unit.target: 平原

trans-unit.resname: CLB·452 | Plains | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lady Bormul claims an owlbear has been trampling her fields, but there's something unnatural about the tracks it left behind.
trans-unit.target: 你听玻穆尔夫人说田地间有枭头熊出没，便动身前往调查，却发现野兽留下的行踪有一些不自然之处。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·453 | Plains | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plains
trans-unit.target: 平原

trans-unit.resname: CLB·453 | Plains | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After spending all day trying to track down a rare tome, you're about to give up when you hear your name whispered from a dark alley.
trans-unit.target: 你花上整天时间遍寻一本罕见卷册而无果，正心灰意冷准备放弃之时，恰好听到黑暗小巷中有人低语轻呼你的名字。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·454 | Plains | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plains
trans-unit.target: 平原

trans-unit.resname: CLB·454 | Plains | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You arrive at Baldur's Gate with instructions to head straight to the heart of the rumor mill: the bakery.
trans-unit.target: 你来到博德之门，受命直奔八卦消息总部：那家面包坊。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·455 | Island | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Island
trans-unit.target: 海岛

trans-unit.resname: CLB·455 | Island | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As you sail past the imposing Seatower of Balduran, you realize that breaking your friend out of that prison will be much harder than you thought.
trans-unit.target: 你驾船经过博德兰望海塔亲见其雄伟巍峨之后，才意识到要将朋友从该处劫狱救出可谓难于登天。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·456 | Island | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Island
trans-unit.target: 海岛

trans-unit.resname: CLB·456 | Island | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As you gaze down upon Wyrm's Crossing, you hear distant cries of alarm, and you notice that all traffic on the bridge has come to a halt.
trans-unit.target: 你正在高处俯瞰巨龙横渡，突然听到远处传来警报呼声，桥上人流来往顿时停滞。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·457 | Island | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Island
trans-unit.target: 海岛

trans-unit.resname: CLB·457 | Island | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You're about to disembark to find the harbormaster when you spot a merfolk darting underneath your ship.
trans-unit.target: 你在准备下船去找港务总管时，看到有人鱼在你船底疾游猛进。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·458 | Island | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Island
trans-unit.target: 海岛

trans-unit.resname: CLB·458 | Island | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The ship's captain promised she'd get you safely to the Netherese ruin, but *she* is the one who just washed overboard.
trans-unit.target: 你虽得船长保证，会被安稳送抵耐瑟瑞尔遗迹，但说这话的*她*刚刚才被海浪卷下甲板。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·459 | Swamp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swamp
trans-unit.target: 沼泽

trans-unit.resname: CLB·459 | Swamp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Now that you've clearly hit the "marsh" part of Lizard Marsh, you begin to worry about the "lizard" part.
trans-unit.target: 你现在已经来到了蜥蜴沼泽的「沼泽」部分，开始担心此地名称中的「蜥蜴」部分。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·460 | Swamp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swamp
trans-unit.target: 沼泽

trans-unit.resname: CLB·460 | Swamp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The sudden sinkhole was surprising enough, but nothing could have prepared you for the ancient city that was hidden underneath.
trans-unit.target: 你面对这突如其来的地陷已经被吓得手脚慌乱，但对于埋藏地底的古城遗迹来说，这点热身还远远不够。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·461 | Swamp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swamp
trans-unit.target: 沼泽

trans-unit.resname: CLB·461 | Swamp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The old wizard's experiments destroyed the castle centuries ago. So why does some of the rubble look recent?
trans-unit.target: 你知道这座城堡毁于数百年前老法师的一次疯狂实验。但为什么有些碎石看起来很新？

trans-unit.resname: CLB·462 | Swamp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swamp
trans-unit.target: 沼泽

trans-unit.resname: CLB·462 | Swamp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: At the mouth of the sewer pipe, you realize it's massive enough that even a giant could walk through without stooping. That gives you an idea . . .
trans-unit.target: 你站在下水道口，发觉整个管道十分庞大，甚至巨人不需弯腰也能出入自如。你顿时心生一计…

trans-unit.resname: CLB·463 | Mountain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mountain
trans-unit.target: 山脉

trans-unit.resname: CLB·463 | Mountain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As you explore the slums of the Outer City, you keep hearing rumors of a den of werewolves in the caves below Dusthawk Hill.
trans-unit.target: 你在探索外城区的贫民窟时，常能听到尘鹰山脚洞穴中藏有一处狼人巢穴的传言。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·464 | Mountain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mountain
trans-unit.target: 山脉

trans-unit.resname: CLB·464 | Mountain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lord Jannath sent you to secure the mine from gnoll raiders, but so far you haven't seen any gnolls . . . or, for that matter, any miners.
trans-unit.target: 你受加纳斯领主之托，前去保护矿井免受豺狼人掠夺者袭击，但你到现在都没见到任何豺狼人…甚至也没有见到任何矿工。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·465 | Mountain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mountain
trans-unit.target: 山脉

trans-unit.resname: CLB·465 | Mountain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Rumor holds that powerful artifacts and untold wealth are hidden away in Ramazith's Tower, and today you plan to find out for yourself.
trans-unit.target: 你一直听说拉马齐斯之塔里面藏有强力奇械与无尽财富，如今终有机会亲身一探究竟。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·466 | Mountain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mountain
trans-unit.target: 山脉

trans-unit.resname: CLB·466 | Mountain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As you pause mid-climb to catch your breath, you'd swear you can hear a heartbeat pulsing deep within the mountain.
trans-unit.target: 你爬到半山腰停下来想喘口气，回荡群山之间的隆隆心跳清晰到你愿立誓为证。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·467 | Forest | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forest
trans-unit.target: 树林

trans-unit.resname: CLB·467 | Forest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You know that hiexel bark produces a lot of smoke when burned, but why would Rilsa Rael need so much of it?
trans-unit.target: 你知道烽火木树皮烧起来会产生滚滚烽烟，但为什么廖莎雷尔要用到这么多呢？

trans-unit.resname: CLB·468 | Forest | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forest
trans-unit.target: 树林

trans-unit.resname: CLB·468 | Forest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The lights in the cavern glow and fade, glow and fade in a rhythm that must have a deeper meaning, if only you can figure it out.
trans-unit.target: 你发现洞窟深处透出的光芒时明时暗，其中的规律必有深意；不过你得自己推敲出来。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·469 | Forest | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forest
trans-unit.target: 树林

trans-unit.resname: CLB·469 | Forest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You continue to mutter and complain as you trip over yet another gnarled root. From behind the nearest tree trunk, something mutters back.
trans-unit.target: 你又给多瘤的树根跘倒了一次，忍不住碎嘴了几句。而在靠你最近的树干后方，也有个什么东西对你碎嘴着。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·470 | Forest | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forest
trans-unit.target: 树林

trans-unit.resname: CLB·470 | Forest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You're on your way home when you spot the gates of a strange city . . . one that isn't on the map and wasn't here when you traveled this path four days ago.
trans-unit.target: 你在回家路上瞥见这座通往陌生城市的门户…它不在地图上，而且你四天前才走过这条路，那时也没这东西。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·471 | Abdel Adrian, Gorion's Ward | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Abdel Adrian, Gorion's Ward
trans-unit.target: 葛力安养子阿波戴尔亚德恩

trans-unit.resname: CLB·471 | Abdel Adrian, Gorion's Ward | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile any number of other nonland permanents you control until Abdel Adrian leaves the battlefield. Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each permanent exiled this way.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐任意数量由你操控的其他非地永久物，直到阿波戴尔亚德恩离开战场为止。每以此法放逐一个永久物，便派出一个1/1白色士兵衍生生物。 选择身世

trans-unit.resname: CLB·472 | Ellyn Harbreeze, Busybody | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ellyn Harbreeze, Busybody
trans-unit.target: 大忙人艾琳哈碧兹

trans-unit.resname: CLB·472 | Ellyn Harbreeze, Busybody | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of tokens you created this turn. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为你本回合中派出过的衍生物数量。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。 选择身世

trans-unit.resname: CLB·473 | Far Traveler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Far Traveler
trans-unit.target: 远地旅者

trans-unit.resname: CLB·473 | Far Traveler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target tapped creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「在你的结束步骤开始时，放逐至多一个目标由你操控且已横置的生物，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·473 | Far Traveler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You have traveled to many places, over mountains and across seas, but a new journey always calls.
trans-unit.target: 你曾翻山渡海造访许多地方，但总还有新的旅程在等待。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·474 | Flaming Fist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Flaming Fist
trans-unit.target: 焰拳佣兵

trans-unit.resname: CLB·474 | Flaming Fist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks, it gains double strike until end of turn."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「每当此生物攻击时，它获得连击异能直到回合结束。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·474 | Flaming Fist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You carry the security of Baldur's Gate on your shoulders, and you welcome the weight of responsibility.
trans-unit.target: 你肩负守卫博德之门的职责，也很乐意承担这份重任。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·475 | Inspiring Leader | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inspiring Leader
trans-unit.target: 励志领袖

trans-unit.resname: CLB·475 | Inspiring Leader | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "Creature tokens you control get +2/+2."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「由你操控的衍生生物得+2/+2。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·475 | Inspiring Leader | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Your family needed a farmer, so you tilled. Your town needed a fighter, so you trained. When your people needed a leader, you knew what you had to do.
trans-unit.target: 家人需要农夫，你便下田耕作。家乡需要战士，你便参军受训。当人民需要领袖，你知道该挺身而出。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·476 | Lae'zel, Vlaakith's Champion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lae'zel, Vlaakith's Champion
trans-unit.target: 维拉基斯勇将莱埃泽尔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·476 | Lae'zel, Vlaakith's Champion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If you would put one or more counters on a creature or planeswalker you control or on yourself, put that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 如果你将在你自己或某个由你操控的生物或鹏洛客上放置一个或数个指示物，则改为在该牌手或永久物上放置该数量加一的各种指示物。 选择身世

trans-unit.resname: CLB·477 | Lulu, Loyal Hollyphant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lulu, Loyal Hollyphant
trans-unit.target: 忠诚圣飞象路路

trans-unit.resname: CLB·477 | Lulu, Loyal Hollyphant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nAt the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each tapped creature you control, then untap them.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则在每个由你操控且已横置的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后重置它们。 选择身世

trans-unit.resname: CLB·478 | Noble Heritage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Noble Heritage
trans-unit.target: 贵族后人

trans-unit.resname: CLB·478 | Noble Heritage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "When this creature enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. For each opponent who does, you gain protection from that player until your next turn." (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything controlled by that player.)
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「当此生物进战场和在你的维持开始时，每位牌手各可以在一个由其操控的生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。对每位如此作的对手而言，你获得反该牌手保护异能直到你的下一个回合。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·479 | Rasaad yn Bashir | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rasaad yn Bashir
trans-unit.target: 拉萨德殷巴希尔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·479 | Rasaad yn Bashir | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, if you have the initiative, double the toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控的生物皆依照其防御力来分配战斗伤害，而不是依照力量。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，若你握有先制，则将每个由你操控之生物的防御力加倍直到回合结束。 选择身世

trans-unit.resname: CLB·480 | Veteran Soldier | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Veteran Soldier
trans-unit.target: 历战士兵

trans-unit.resname: CLB·480 | Veteran Soldier | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that player, for each opponent, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking that opponent."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「每当此生物攻击任一牌手时，若没有对手的总生命比该牌手多，则对每位对手而言，你派出一个1/1白色士兵衍生生物，其为横置且正向该牌手进行攻击。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·480 | Veteran Soldier | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You've always been happiest fighting for a cause you believe in alongside loyal comrades.
trans-unit.target: 你一直与同袍作伴为自身信念而战，每天都斗志昂扬。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·481 | Alora, Merry Thief | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，至多一个目标进行攻击的生物本回合不能被阻挡。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将该生物移回其拥有者手上。 选择身世

trans-unit.resname: CLB·482 | Candlekeep Sage | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CLB·482 | Candlekeep Sage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You love the smell of dusty tomes, the flicker of candles during late-night reading, and the old texts that bring to life the scholars who have come before.
trans-unit.target: 你热爱尘封书卷的陈年气味，钟情挑灯夜读的闪烁烛光，沉迷令过往先贤跃然纸上的古老文字。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·483 | Dungeon Delver | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CLB·483 | Dungeon Delver | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 你的动力并非来自对金钱或饰品的欲望，而是源自克服危险的刺激与探索未知的兴奋。

If a spell cast from your graveyard this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

trans-unit.resname: CLB·507 | Karlach, Fury of Avernus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, if it's the first combat phase of the turn, untap all attacking creatures. They gain first strike until end of turn. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，若当前是本回合的首个战斗阶段，则重置所有进行攻击的生物。它们获得先攻异能直到回合结束。在此阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段。 选择身世

trans-unit.resname: CLB·508 | Livaan, Cultist of Tiamat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Livaan, Cultist of Tiamat
trans-unit.target: 提亚玛特教徒丽瓦安

trans-unit.resname: CLB·508 | Livaan, Cultist of Tiamat | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's mana value.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放非生物咒语时，目标生物得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为该咒语的法术力值。 选择身世

trans-unit.resname: CLB·508 | Livaan, Cultist of Tiamat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Her hunger for power consumes what the fire cannot.
trans-unit.target: 她对力量的渴望，能够吞噬一切火焰所不能之物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·509 | Popular Entertainer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Popular Entertainer
trans-unit.target: 热门艺人

trans-unit.resname: CLB·509 | Popular Entertainer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, goad target creature that player controls." (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「每当由你操控的一个或数个生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，煽惑目标由该牌手操控的生物。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·509 | Popular Entertainer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The last thing anyone would describe you as is shy. You love the spotlight, and it loves you back.
trans-unit.target: 你的形象在别人的心目中与害羞无缘。你爱站在聚光灯下，聚光灯外的民众也爱你。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·510 | Street Urchin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Street Urchin
trans-unit.target: 街头流浪儿

trans-unit.resname: CLB·510 | Street Urchin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "{1}, Sacrifice another creature or an artifact: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「{1}，牺牲另一个生物或一个神器：此生物对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·510 | Street Urchin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Your harsh upbringing on the streets of the city left you crafty, resilient, and wise beyond your years.
trans-unit.target: 你在城市街头艰难求存，让你拥有与年龄不相称的心计、坚韧与睿智。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·511 | Tavern Brawler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tavern Brawler
trans-unit.target: 酒馆斗殴客

trans-unit.resname: CLB·511 | Tavern Brawler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. This creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's mana value. You may play that card this turn."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「在你的维持开始时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。此生物得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为该牌的法术力值。本回合中，你可以使用该牌。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·511 | Tavern Brawler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The only thing you love more than a good drink is a good fight. Luckily, one usually follows the other.
trans-unit.target: 你对美酒的热爱仅次于斗殴。幸运的是，这两者通常会顺序出现。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·512 | Wyll, Blade of Frontiers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wyll, Blade of Frontiers
trans-unit.target: 边境之刃威迩

trans-unit.resname: CLB·512 | Wyll, Blade of Frontiers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If you would roll one or more dice, instead roll that many dice plus one and ignore the lowest roll.\nWhenever you roll one or more dice, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 如果你将掷一颗或数颗骰子，改为掷原数量加一颗骰子并忽略最小点数。 每当你掷一颗或数颗骰子时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 选择身世

trans-unit.resname: CLB·513 | Acolyte of Bahamut | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Acolyte of Bahamut
trans-unit.target: 巴哈姆特的侍僧

trans-unit.resname: CLB·513 | Acolyte of Bahamut | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "The first Dragon spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「你每回合中施放的第一个龙咒语减少{2}来施放。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·513 | Acolyte of Bahamut | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You were on a wayward path until Bahamut showed you that power and kindness can unite beneath the same banner.
trans-unit.target: 你原本刚愎自用，直到巴哈姆特向你展现力量与善良能结合为一方才释怀。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·514 | Cloakwood Hermit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cloakwood Hermit
trans-unit.target: 斗篷森林隐士

trans-unit.resname: CLB·514 | Cloakwood Hermit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your end step, if a creature card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, create two tapped 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens."
trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有生物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场，则派出两个已横置的1/1绿色松鼠衍生生物。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·514 | Cloakwood Hermit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You've always preferred the company of animals to people.
trans-unit.target: 你更喜欢与动物为伍，而不愿与人作伴。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·515 | Erinis, Gloom Stalker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Erinis, Gloom Stalker
trans-unit.target: 幽域追踪者艾琳尼斯

trans-unit.resname: CLB·515 | Erinis, Gloom Stalker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 死触 每当CARDNAME攻击时，将目标地牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 选择身世

trans-unit.target: {1}：直到回合结束，目标由你操控的衍生物成为基础力量与防御力为4/4的绿色熊生物，且仍具有原本颜色与类别。 选择身世

trans-unit.target: 强健化外之民

trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「每当此生物攻击任一牌手时，若没有对手的总生命比该牌手多，则另一个目标由你操控的生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为此生物的力量。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·517 | Hardy Outlander | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You're a born explorer, happiest forging your way through the untamed wilds.
trans-unit.target: 你是天生的探险家，喜欢在未驯服的荒野中劈荆前行。

trans-unit.source: Jaheira, Friend of the Forest
trans-unit.target: 树林之友贾希拉

trans-unit.resname: CLB·518 | Jaheira, Friend of the Forest | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Tokens you control have "{T}: Add {G}."\nChoose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的衍生物具有「{T}：加{G}。」 选择身世

trans-unit.resname: CLB·518 | Jaheira, Friend of the Forest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Harpers' movement grows, but it needs sunlight to blossom. We can be that light."
trans-unit.target: 「虽然竖琴手同盟势力在发展壮大，但也需要阳光才能开花结果。我们能成为这缕阳光。」

trans-unit.target: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「此生物进战场时上面额外有一个+1/+1指示物」与「由你操控的其他生物进战场时上面额外有一个+1/+1指示物。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·519 | Master Chef | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You never thought "rations" was an appropriate term for the feasts you prepare for your party.
trans-unit.target: 你从未想过你为冒险团同伴准备的大餐最后会被称作「口粮」。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·520 | Raised by Giants | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Your parents taught you that strength can be nurtured and honed, no matter one's size.
trans-unit.target: 你受父母教导，无论个体身形如何，力量都能磨练培养。

This spell can't be countered.
Vigilance, reach, trample
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

trans-unit.source: Alaundo the Seer
trans-unit.target: 先知阿兰多

trans-unit.resname: CLB·523 | Alaundo the Seer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand and put a number of time counters on it equal to its mana value. It gains "When the last time counter is removed from this card, if it's exiled, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you cast a creature spell this way, it gains haste until end of turn." Then remove a time counter from each other card you own in exile.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后从你手上放逐一张牌，并在其上放置若干计时指示物，其数量等同于其法术力值。它获得「当从此牌上移去最后一个计时指示物时，若它已放逐，则你可以施放它且不需支付其法术力费用。若你以此法施放生物咒语，则它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。」然后从放逐区中每张由你拥有的其他牌上各移去一个计时指示物。

trans-unit.target: 颓废的阿斯代伦

trans-unit.resname: CLB·524 | Astarion, the Decadent | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Deathtouch, lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, choose one —
• Feed — Target opponent loses life equal to the amount of life they lost this turn.
• Friends — You gain life equal to the amount of life you gained this turn.
trans-unit.target: 死触，系命 在你的结束步骤开始时，选择一项～ •相食～目标对手失去若干生命，其数量等同于他本回合中失去过的生命数量。 •相伴～你获得若干生命，其数量等同于你本回合中获得过的生命数量。

trans-unit.source: Baba Lysaga, Night Witch
trans-unit.target: 暗夜女巫芭芭莱萨迦

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice up to three permanents: If there were three or more card types among the sacrificed permanents, each opponent loses 3 life, you gain 3 life, and you draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲至多三个永久物：如果所牺牲的永久物中包括三种或更多牌张类别，则每位对手各失去3点生命，你获得3点生命，且你抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·525 | Baba Lysaga, Night Witch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Better the cold night than her warm hospitality.
trans-unit.target: 宁可置身寒夜，也不要接受她的热情。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·526 | Bane, Lord of Darkness | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, CARDNAME has indestructible.\nWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, target opponent may have you draw a card. If they don't, you may put a creature card with equal or lesser toughness from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的总生命等于或小于你起始总生命的一半，CARDNAME便具有不灭异能。 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，目标对手可以令你抓一张牌。若他未如此作，则你可以将一张防御力相等或较小的生物牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·528 | Cadira, Caller of the Small | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She roams the border between wilderness and civilization, protecting those who need it most.
trans-unit.target: 她梭巡荒野与文明的边界，保护最需要庇护的生灵。

trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，本回合中，你从放逐区施放的咒语减少{X}来施放，X为受攻击的牌手数量。放逐你牌库顶的X张牌。直到回合结束，你可以从所放逐的牌之中施放咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·529 | Commander Liara Portyr | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's a ghoul-eat-you world out there. Follow my orders if you want to survive."
trans-unit.target: 「外面是一个鬼吃人的世界。要想活命就得听我号令。」

trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手于其回合中抓他的第二张牌时，你抓一张牌。 每当任一牌手于其回合中施放他的第二个咒语时，你派出一个2/2白色骑士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·536 | Jon Irenicus, Shattered One | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jon Irenicus, Shattered One
trans-unit.target: 破碎之人琼艾瑞尼卡斯

trans-unit.resname: CLB·536 | Jon Irenicus, Shattered One | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, target opponent gains control of up to one target creature you control. Put two +1/+1 counters on it and tap it. It's goaded for the rest of the game and it gains "This creature can't be sacrificed." (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)\nWhenever a creature you own but don't control attacks, you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，目标对手获得至多一个目标由你操控之生物的操控权。在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物并横置它。它在本盘游戏接下来的时段均已煽惑，且它获得「此生物不能被牺牲。」 每当一个由你拥有但不由你操控的生物攻击时，你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·537 | Kagha, Shadow Archdruid | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kagha, Shadow Archdruid
trans-unit.target: 暗影大德鲁伊卡格佳

trans-unit.resname: CLB·537 | Kagha, Shadow Archdruid | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it gains deathtouch until end of turn. Mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)\nOnce during each of your turns, you may play a land or cast a permanent spell from among cards in your graveyard that were put there from your library this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，它获得死触异能直到回合结束。磨两张牌。 仅于你的每个回合中且限一次，你可以从本回合自你牌库进入你坟墓场的牌之中使用一个地或施放一个永久物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·538 | Korlessa, Scale Singer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.\nYou may cast Dragon spells from the top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。 你可以从你的牌库顶施放龙咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·538 | Korlessa, Scale Singer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Would you like a song of wing-wind and fire, or one of gentle heartbeats atop a golden hoard?"
trans-unit.target: 「你是想听一曲翼风烈火交织的激情乐曲，还是坐拥金银财宝的抒情小调？」

trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你施放历险咒语或龙咒语时，CARDNAME对任意一个不为指挥官的目标造成伤害，其数量等同于该咒语的法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·539 | Lozhan, Dragons' Legacy | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 她通联传说与回忆，将其交织为络绎不绝的致命奥术之力。

trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，本回合中每有一个生物死去，便派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·540 | Mahadi, Emporium Master | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Welcome to the Wandering Emporium. Feel free to browse the bazaar. We have everything a lost soul could want, need, or afford."
trans-unit.target: 「欢迎来到漫流货棚。市集敬请自由参观。但凡失落灵魂会要、需要或要得起的东西，我们都有。」

trans-unit.source: Whenever an enchanted creature attacks one of your opponents, it gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.\nWhenever an Aura you control is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile it. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast that card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个受有灵气的生物攻击你的任一对手时，直到回合结束，它得+2/+0且获得践踏异能。 每当一个由你操控的灵气从战场进入你的坟墓场时，将它放逐。直到你下一个回合的回合结束，你可以施放该牌。

trans-unit.source: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, CARDNAME has indestructible.\nWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's an enchantment and loses all other card types.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的总生命等于或小于你起始总生命的一半，CARDNAME便具有不灭异能。 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以将它放逐。若你如此作，则派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该牌的复制品，但它是结界且失去所有其他牌张类别。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell, you may put it on the bottom of its owner's library. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. trans-unit.target: 每当你施放咒语时，你可以将它置于其拥有者的牌库底。若你如此作，则从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

Otherwise, put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

1–9 | You may put a land card from among those cards onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.target: 将六个目标非地永久物各移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·712 | Aether Gale | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The militia formed up in the central plaza awaiting the onslaught, but the giants never quite made it.
trans-unit.target: 义勇兵已在中心广场严阵以待，准备抵御巨人强大攻势，但敌人却从未出现。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·713 | Angler Turtle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angler Turtle
trans-unit.target: 渔猎龟

trans-unit.resname: CLB·713 | Angler Turtle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hexproof\nCreatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: 辟邪 由对手操控的生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·713 | Angler Turtle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It is ancient, immense, and irresistible.
trans-unit.target: 它古老而巨大，且诱惑难挡。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·714 | Chasm Skulker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chasm Skulker
trans-unit.target: 深峡潜怪

trans-unit.resname: CLB·714 | Chasm Skulker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, create X 1/1 blue Squid creature tokens with islandwalk, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓一张牌时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 当CARDNAME死去时，派出X个1/1蓝色，具海岛行者异能的乌贼衍生生物，X为CARDNAME上的+1/+1指示物数量。（只要防御牌手操控海岛，它们便不能被阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·715 | Compulsive Research | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Compulsive Research
trans-unit.target: 强制探寻

trans-unit.resname: CLB·715 | Compulsive Research | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓三张牌。然后除非该牌手弃一张地牌，否则其弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·715 | Compulsive Research | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"
trans-unit.target: 「四份融解青铜，有了…一份冰冻水银，有了，有了…还需要什么？」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·716 | Curse of the Swine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Curse of the Swine
trans-unit.target: 野猪之咒

trans-unit.resname: CLB·716 | Curse of the Swine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile X target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 2/2 green Boar creature token.
trans-unit.target: 放逐X个目标生物。对每个以此法放逐的生物而言，其操控者派出一个2/2绿色野猪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·716 | Curse of the Swine | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Another imminent battle subsided in busy snuffling and carefree rooting.
trans-unit.target: 另一场迫在眉睫的战役，在乱嗅和随意拱土之间消弭于无形。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·717 | Curse of Verbosity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Curse of Verbosity
trans-unit.target: 赘言诅咒

trans-unit.resname: CLB·717 | Curse of Verbosity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant player\nWhenever enchanted player is attacked, you draw a card. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.
trans-unit.target: 结附于牌手 每当所结附的牌手被攻击时，你抓一张牌。每位正向该牌手进行攻击的对手亦如此。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·717 | Curse of Verbosity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Idle chatter beckons many an attentive ear.
trans-unit.target: 闲言碎语招引各路好事之徒。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·718 | Dissipation Field | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dissipation Field
trans-unit.target: 消散力场

trans-unit.resname: CLB·718 | Dissipation Field | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a permanent deals damage to you, return it to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个永久物对你造成伤害时，将它移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·718 | Dissipation Field | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Strike me once, shame on you. Strike me twice . . . Well, let's just see if you can."\n—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent
trans-unit.target: 「打我一次，是你无耻。打我两次…嗯，先看看你能不能吧。」 ～纽若克密探凯拉黎

trans-unit.resname: CLB·719 | Domineering Will | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Domineering Will
trans-unit.target: 意志霸揽

trans-unit.resname: CLB·719 | Domineering Will | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player gains control of up to three target nonattacking creatures until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They block this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手获得至多三个目标非进行攻击之生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置这些生物。它们本回合若能进行阻挡，则须如此作。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·720 | Fact or Fiction | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fact or Fiction
trans-unit.target: 真伪莫辨

trans-unit.resname: CLB·720 | Fact or Fiction | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的五张牌。由任一对手将它们分成两堆。将其中一堆置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·720 | Fact or Fiction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."
trans-unit.target: 「就试着假装你知道什么比较重要好了。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·721 | Forgotten Creation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forgotten Creation
trans-unit.target: 遭忘造物

trans-unit.resname: CLB·721 | Forgotten Creation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 潜匿（此生物不能被力量比它大的生物阻挡。） 在你的维持开始时，你可以弃掉你的手牌。若你如此作，则抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·721 | Forgotten Creation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My earliest work escapes me."\n—Stitcher Geralf
trans-unit.target: 「我最早的作品逃走了。」 ～拼接师基拉夫

trans-unit.resname: CLB·722 | Fractured Sanity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fractured Sanity
trans-unit.target: 裂崩心智

trans-unit.resname: CLB·722 | Fractured Sanity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each opponent mills fourteen cards.\nCycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle CARDNAME, each opponent mills four cards.
trans-unit.target: 每位对手各磨十四张牌。 循环{1}{U}（{1}{U}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。） 当你循环CARDNAME时，每位对手各磨四张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·722 | Fractured Sanity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The body grows stronger under stress. The mind does not.
trans-unit.target: 压力越大，身体越壮。心智则不然。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·723 | Grazilaxx, Illithid Scholar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grazilaxx, Illithid Scholar
trans-unit.target: 灵吸怪学者葛拉吉拉克斯

trans-unit.resname: CLB·723 | Grazilaxx, Illithid Scholar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, you may return it to its owner's hand.\nWhenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物被阻挡时，你可以将它移回其拥有者手上。 每当由你操控的一个或数个生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·723 | Grazilaxx, Illithid Scholar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You studied hard. How delicious!"
trans-unit.target: 「你努力过了。真好吃！」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·724 | Hullbreaker Horror | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hullbreaker Horror
trans-unit.target: 碎船惊惧兽

trans-unit.resname: CLB·724 | Hullbreaker Horror | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Flash
This spell can't be countered.
Whenever you cast a spell, choose up to one —
• Return target spell you don't control to its owner's hand.
• Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 此咒语不能被反击。 每当你施放咒语时，选择至多一项～ •将目标不由你操控的咒语移回其拥有者手上。 •将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·725 | Keiga, the Tide Star | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Keiga, the Tide Star
trans-unit.target: 苍龙京河

trans-unit.resname: CLB·725 | Keiga, the Tide Star | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME dies, gain control of target creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME死去时，获得目标生物的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·725 | Keiga, the Tide Star | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The pull of the tide star holds eternal sway.
trans-unit.target: 京河引潮，苍海翻腾，牵引万物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·726 | Leyline of Anticipation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of Anticipation
trans-unit.target: 先制地脉

trans-unit.resname: CLB·726 | Leyline of Anticipation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.\nYou may cast spells as though they had flash.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了CARDNAME，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。 你可以将咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·727 | Midnight Clock | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Midnight Clock
trans-unit.target: 午夜怪钟

trans-unit.resname: CLB·727 | Midnight Clock | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
{T}: Add {U}.
{2}{U}: Put an hour counter on CARDNAME.
At the beginning of each upkeep, put an hour counter on CARDNAME.
When the twelfth hour counter is put on CARDNAME, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{U}。 {2}{U}：在CARDNAME上放置一个时刻指示物。 在每个维持开始时，在CARDNAME上放置一个时刻指示物。 当在CARDNAME上放置第十二个时刻指示物时，将你的手牌和坟墓场洗入你的牌库，然后抓七张牌。放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·728 | Mind Flayer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mind Flayer
trans-unit.target: 夺心魔

trans-unit.resname: CLB·728 | Mind Flayer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Dominate Monster — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature for as long as you control CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 支配怪物～当CARDNAME进战场时，于你操控CARDNAME的时段内，获得目标生物的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·728 | Mind Flayer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Shed your thoughts and let my will flow through you."
trans-unit.target: 「抛弃旧念，让我的意志贯彻全身。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·729 | Overcharged Amalgam | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Overcharged Amalgam
trans-unit.target: 溢电拼合怪

trans-unit.resname: CLB·729 | Overcharged Amalgam | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Flash
Flying
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When CARDNAME exploits a creature, counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 榨取（当此生物进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物。） 当CARDNAME榨取生物时，反击目标咒语，起动式异能或触发式异能。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·730 | Propaganda | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Propaganda
trans-unit.target: 宣导

trans-unit.resname: CLB·730 | Propaganda | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
trans-unit.target: 对每个生物而言，除非其操控者为其支付{2}，否则它不能攻击你。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·730 | Propaganda | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The cost of your opposition will be extracted from your wits."\n—Nekusar, the Mindrazer
trans-unit.target: 「你反抗的代价将从你的智慧中萃取。」 ～毁灵师奈库萨

trans-unit.resname: CLB·731 | Pull from Tomorrow | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pull from Tomorrow
trans-unit.target: 取自明日

trans-unit.resname: CLB·731 | Pull from Tomorrow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw X cards, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓X张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·731 | Pull from Tomorrow | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I do things in my own time."\n—Etha, initiate of Rhet crop
trans-unit.target: 「我用自己的时间处理事宜。」 ～雷特祀群祀徒爱瑟

trans-unit.resname: CLB·732 | Pursued Whale | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pursued Whale
trans-unit.target: 遭猎白鲸

trans-unit.resname: CLB·732 | Pursued Whale | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each opponent creates a 1/1 red Pirate creature token with "This creature can't block" and "Creatures you control attack each combat if able."\nSpells your opponents cast that target CARDNAME cost {3} more to cast.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位对手各派出一个1/1红色海盗衍生生物，且具有「此生物不能进行阻挡」与「由你操控的生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。」 对手施放之以CARDNAME为目标的咒语增加{3}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·733 | Reflections of Littjara | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reflections of Littjara
trans-unit.target: 利雅拉映影

trans-unit.resname: CLB·733 | Reflections of Littjara | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nWhenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, copy that spell. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种生物类别。 每当你施放该类别的咒语时，复制该咒语。（永久物咒语的复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·733 | Reflections of Littjara | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The masks float downstream toward the Mirrorlake, where faces arise to wear them.
trans-unit.target: 面具顺流而下直达镜湖，湖中浮出面容欣然戴上。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·734 | Reins of Power | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reins of Power
trans-unit.target: 能量之缰

trans-unit.resname: CLB·734 | Reins of Power | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Untap all creatures you control and all creatures target opponent controls. You and that opponent each gain control of all creatures the other controls until end of turn. Those creatures gain haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 重置所有由你操控的生物和所有由目标对手操控的生物。直到回合结束，你与该对手分别操控由对方操控的所有生物。这些生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·735 | Sludge Monster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sludge Monster
trans-unit.target: 泥泞怪物

trans-unit.resname: CLB·735 | Sludge Monster | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, put a slime counter on up to one other target creature.\nNon-Horror creatures with slime counters on them lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 2/2.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，在至多另一个目标生物上放置一个黏菌指示物。 所有其上有黏菌指示物的非惊惧兽生物都失去所有异能，且基础力量与防御力均为2/2。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·735 | Sludge Monster | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Tracking it isn't the hard part.
trans-unit.target: 追踪它并不难。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·736 | Sly Instigator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sly Instigator
trans-unit.target: 狡黠煽动师

trans-unit.resname: CLB·736 | Sly Instigator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {U}, {T}: Until your next turn, target creature an opponent controls can't be blocked. Goad that creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: {U}，{T}：直到你的下一个回合，目标由对手操控的生物不能被阻挡。煽惑该生物。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: CLB·736 | Sly Instigator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Me? I'm just an innocent bystander!"
trans-unit.target: 「我？不过是个无辜路人罢了！」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·737 | Wharf Infiltrator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wharf Infiltrator
trans-unit.target: 码头渗透者

trans-unit.resname: CLB·737 | Wharf Infiltrator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.\nWhenever you discard a creature card, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.
trans-unit.target: 潜匿（此生物不能被力量比它大的生物阻挡。） 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。 每当你弃一张生物牌时，你可以支付{2}。若你如此作，则派出一个3/2无色奥札奇／惊惧兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·738 | Will Kenrith | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Will Kenrith
trans-unit.target: 威尔肯理斯

trans-unit.resname: CLB·738 | Will Kenrith | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
+2: Until your next turn, up to two target creatures each have base power and toughness 0/3 and lose all abilities.
−2: Target player draws two cards. Until your next turn, instant, sorcery, and planeswalker spells that player casts cost {2} less to cast.
−8: Target player gets an emblem with "Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy."
Partner with Rowan Kenrith
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: +2：选择至多两个目标生物。直到你的下一个回合，这些生物的基础力量和防御力为0/3，且失去所有异能。 −2：目标牌手抓两张牌。直到你的下一个回合，该牌手施放的瞬间、法术和鹏洛客咒语减少{2}来施放。 −8：目标牌手获得具有以下异能的徽记～「每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，将其复制。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。」 与萝婉肯理斯拍档 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·739 | Black Market | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Black Market
trans-unit.target: 黑市

trans-unit.resname: CLB·739 | Black Market | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature dies, put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\nAt the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} for each charge counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 在你战斗前的行动阶段开始时，CARDNAME上每有一个充电指示物，便加{B}。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·740 | Bloodsoaked Champion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodsoaked Champion
trans-unit.target: 浴血斗士

trans-unit.resname: CLB·740 | Bloodsoaked Champion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't block.\nRaid — {1}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only if you attacked this turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。 突击～{1}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回战场。只能于你攻击过的回合中起动。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·740 | Bloodsoaked Champion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Death is merely another foe the Mardu will overcome."
trans-unit.target: 「死亡对玛尔都而言，只不过是又一个手下败将。」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·741 | Butcher of Malakir | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Butcher of Malakir
trans-unit.target: 马拉奇屠夫

trans-unit.resname: CLB·741 | Butcher of Malakir | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的生物死去时，每位对手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·741 | Butcher of Malakir | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.
trans-unit.target: 他永远判定有罪。他总是裁决处死。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·742 | Calculating Lich | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Calculating Lich
trans-unit.target: 心计巫妖

trans-unit.resname: CLB·742 | Calculating Lich | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace\nWhenever a creature attacks one of your opponents, that player loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 威慑 每当一个生物攻击你的任一对手时，该牌手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·742 | Calculating Lich | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We share a common enemy. Does that not make us friends?"
trans-unit.target: 「我们有相同的对手。这样我们还不是朋友吗？」

trans-unit.resname: CLB·743 | Changeling Outcast | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Changeling Outcast
trans-unit.target: 化形黜人

trans-unit.resname: CLB·743 | Changeling Outcast | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)\nCARDNAME can't block and can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 化形（此牌是所有生物类别。） CARDNAME不能进行阻挡，也不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·743 | Changeling Outcast | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A mercurial face sows distrust. Distrust reaps a lonely life.
trans-unit.target: 变幻面容埋下猜疑祸根。猜疑祸根长出孤独人生。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·744 | Corpse Augur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Corpse Augur
trans-unit.target: 尸体卜算师

trans-unit.resname: CLB·744 | Corpse Augur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creature cards in target player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，你抓X张牌且失去X点生命，X为目标牌手坟墓场中的生物牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·744 | Corpse Augur | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even when the flesh grows cold, knowledge waits in the bones for a master to release it.
trans-unit.target: 纵使肉身渐寒，知识仍会存于骸骨之中，等待大师发掘。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·745 | Crippling Fear | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Crippling Fear
trans-unit.target: 恐惧缚身

trans-unit.resname: CLB·745 | Crippling Fear | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose a creature type. Creatures that aren't of the chosen type get -3/-3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种生物类别。不为该类别的生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·745 | Crippling Fear | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Panic spread like wildfire as the demons of Immersturm poured into Bretagard, slaughtering as they came.
trans-unit.target: 无尽风暴的恶魔涌入碧塔嘉一路烧杀，惊恐便如同野火一般迅速蔓延开来。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·746 | Curtains' Call | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 谢幕演出

trans-unit.source: Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)\nDestroy two target creatures.
trans-unit.target: 不屈（每有一位对手，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。） 消灭两个目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·746 | Curtains' Call | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We give the audience what they want."\n—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

trans-unit.target: 黑暗幼雏

trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭目标非黑色的生物。它不能重生。

trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. You may look at and cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.
trans-unit.target: 死触 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视目标对手牌库顶的四张牌，将其中一张牌面朝下地放逐，然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于该牌库底。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以检视并施放该牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意种类的法术力来支付施放该咒语的费用。

It has haste.)\nWhenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, if CARDNAME is suspended, you may remove a time counter from CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: CLB·832 | Sakura-Tribe Elder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There were no tombstones in orochi territory. Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.

trans-unit.resname: CLB·927 | Vault of the Archangel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "For centuries my creation kept this world in balance. Now only her shadow remains."\n—Sorin Markov
trans-unit.target: 「数百年来，我的造物让这世界保持平衡。现在只剩下她的阴影。」 ～索霖马可夫

trans-unit.resname: CLB·928 | Wandering Fumarole | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U} or {R}.\n{2}{U}{R}: Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a 1/4 blue and red Elemental creature with "{0}: Switch this creature's power and toughness until end of turn." It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}或{R}。 {2}{U}{R}：直到回合结束，CARDNAME成为1/4，蓝红双色的元素生物，且具有「{0}：将此生物的力量与防御力互换直到回合结束。」它仍然是地。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·930 | Windbrisk Heights | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Windbrisk Heights
trans-unit.target: 迅风高地

trans-unit.resname: CLB·930 | Windbrisk Heights | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Hideaway 4 (When this land enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{W}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if you attacked with three or more creatures this turn.
trans-unit.target: 掩蔽4（当此地进战场时，检视你牌库顶的四张牌，将其中一张牌面朝下地放逐，然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于牌库底。） CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}。 {W}，{T}：如果你本回合中曾以三个或更多生物攻击，则你可以使用所放逐的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·936 | Elder Brain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elder Brain
trans-unit.target: 主脑

trans-unit.resname: CLB·936 | Elder Brain | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks a player, exile all cards from that player's hand, then they draw that many cards. You may play lands and cast spells from among the exiled cards for as long as they remain exiled. If you cast a spell this way, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.
trans-unit.target: 威慑 每当CARDNAME攻击任一牌手时，从该牌手手上放逐所有牌，然后他抓等量的牌。于这些牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以从其中使用地和施放咒语。如果你以此法施放咒语，则你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放它的费用。
